GS40caraka_u:13: sabhyāḥ sadguruvāksudhāsrutiparisphītaśrutīn asmi vo nālaṃ toṣayituṃ payodapayasā nāmbhonidhis tṛpyati /
GS40caraka_u:14: vyākhyābhāsarasaprakāśanam idaṃ tv asmin yadi prāpyate kvāpi kvāpi kaṇo guṇasya tadasau karṇe kṣaṇaṃ dhīyatām // 6
GS40caraka_u:15_1: samprati vartamānālpāyurmedhasāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na samyagarthādhigamaḥ tadanadhigamācca
GS40caraka_u:18_0: nanu prayojanābhidhānaṃ śāstrapravṛttyarthamiti yaduktaṃ tanna yuktaṃ yato na prayojanābhidhānamātreṇa
GS40caraka_u:19_0: atha manyase āptaprayojanābhidhānametadato'tra yathārthatvaṃ nanu bho kathamayaṃ
GS40caraka_u:19_1: prayojanābhidhāyī āptaḥ tadabhihitaśāstrasya yathārthatvāditi cet hanta na yāvacchāstrasya
GS40caraka_u:19_2: prayojanavattāvadhāraṇaṃ na tāvacchāstrapravṛttiḥ na yāvacchāstrapravṛttir na tāvacchāstrasya
GS40caraka_u:19_3: yathārthatvāvadhāraṇaṃ na yāvacchāstrasya yathārthatvāvadhāraṇaṃ na tāvacchāstrasya
GS40caraka_u:19_5: iti cakrakamāpadyate atha manyase mā bhavatu prayojanavattāvadhāraṇam artharūpaprayojanavattāsaṃdeha
GS40caraka_u:19_6: eva pravartako bhaviṣyati kṛṣyādāv api hi pravṛttir arthasaṃdehādeva na hi tatra
GS40caraka_u:20_0: naivaṃ nahi sāmānyena prayojanasaṃdehaḥ prayojanaviśeṣārthinaṃ tathā pravartayati
GS40caraka_u:20_2: viśeṣaviṣayasmaraṇamantarā bhavati ato ye tāvad anavadhṛtāgniveśaprāmāṇyās teṣāṃ
GS40caraka_u:20_3: dhātusāmyasādhanamidaṃ śāstraṃ na vetyevam ākāraviśeṣasaṃdehotpādanārthaṃ prayojanaviśeṣābhidhānaṃ
GS40caraka_u:21: prayojanābhidhāyivākye tu svalpaprayatnabodhye prayojanasāmānyasaṃdehādeva pravṛttirupapannā na punaranekasaṃvatsarakleśabodhye śāstre // 13
GS40caraka_u:22: tadevaṃ yaducyate prayojanābhidhāyivākyapravṛttāv api prayojanamabhidhātavyaṃ tathā cānavasthā iti tannirastaṃ bhavati // 14
GS40caraka_u:24: granthādau maṅgalasevānirastāntarāyāṇāṃ granthakartṛśrotḥṇām avighneneṣṭalābho bhavatīti yuktaṃ maṅgalopādānam // 16
GS40caraka_u:25: athaśabdasya maṅgalatve smṛtir oṃkāraś cāthaśabdaśca dvāv etau brahmaṇaḥ purā // 17
GS40caraka_u:26: kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā viniryātau tena māṅgalikāv ubhau iti // 18
GS40caraka_u:28: yathā atha śabdānuśāsanam athāto dharmaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ vai ityādau // 20
GS40caraka_u:29_1: eva anyathā śiṣṭācāralaṅghanena śiṣṭatvameva na syād vyākhyānāntarāyabhayaśca tathā
GS40caraka_u:30: yathā ca gurvājñālābhānantaram etat tantrakaraṇaṃ tathā atha maitrīparaḥ puṇyam ityādau sphuṭameva // 22
GS40caraka_u:31: granthakaraṇe ca gurvanumatipratipādanena granthasyopādeyatā pradarśitā bhavati // 23
GS40caraka_u:32_0: yat punaḥ śiṣyapraśnānantaryārthatvam athaśabdasya varṇyate tanna māṃ dhinoti nahi
GS40caraka_u:32_1: śiṣyān puro vyavasthāpya śāstraṃ kriyate śrotṛbuddhisthīkāre tu śāstrakaraṇaṃ yuktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:33_0: ataḥśabdo 'dhikāraprāgavadhyupadarśakaḥ ata ūrdhvaṃ yad upadekṣyāmo dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:33_1: taditi yadi vā hetau yena brahmādipraṇītāyurvedatantrāṇām uktena nyāyenotsambandhatvam
GS40caraka_u:33_2: iva ato hetor dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti yojanīyam // 25
GS40caraka_u:34: dīrghaṃjīvitīyam ityatra dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdo 'sminn astīti matvarthe adhyāyānuvākayor luk ca iti chapratyayaḥ // 26
GS40caraka_u:35: yadi vā dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdam adhikṛtya kṛto grantho 'dhyāyarūpastantrarūpo vā ityasyāṃ vivakṣāyām adhikṛtya kṛte granthe ityadhikārāt śiśukrandayamasabha ityādinā chaḥ // 27
GS40caraka_u:37: atra ca satyapi śabdāntare dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdenaiva saṃjñā kṛtā dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdasyaiva pravacanādau niveśāt praśastatvācca // 29
GS40caraka_u:38: dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdo 'sminn asti iti dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdam adhikṛtya kṛto vā ityanayā vyutpattyā dīrghaṃjīvitīyaśabdas tantre 'dhyāye ca pravartanīyaḥ // 30
GS40caraka_u:39_0: tena dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma ityanena tantraṃ prati vyākhyānapratijñā labdhā
GS40caraka_u:39_1: bhavati punar dīrghaṃjīvitīyam iti padam āvartyādhyāyapadasamabhivyāhṛtam adhyāyavyākhyānapratijñāṃ lambhayati // 31
GS40caraka_u:40: dṛṣṭaṃ cāvṛtya padasya yojanaṃ yathā apāmārgataṇḍulīye gaurave śirasaḥ śūle pīnase ityādau śirasa iti padaṃ gaurave ityanena yujyate āvṛtya śūle ityanena ca // 32
GS40caraka_u:41: ataśca yaducyate akṛtatantrapratijñasyādhyāyapratijñā ūnakāyamāneti tannirastaṃ bhavati // 33
GS40caraka_u:42_0: yadi vā adhyāyapratijñaivāstu tayaiva tantrapratijñāpyarthalabdhaiva na hy adhyāyas
GS40caraka_u:42_1: tantravyatiriktaḥ tenāvayavavyākhyāne tantrasyāpyavayavino vyākhyā bhavatyeva yathā
GS40caraka_u:43: avayavāntaravyākhyānapratijñā tu na labhyate tāṃ tu pratyadhyāyameva kariṣyati // 35
GS40caraka_u:44: adhyāyamiti adhipūrvādiṅaḥ iṅaśca iti karmaṇi ghañā sādhyam // 36
GS40caraka_u:46_0: na cānayā vyutpattyā prakaraṇacatuṣkasthānādiṣvatiprasaṅgaḥ yato yogarūḍheyam adhyāyasaṃjñādhyāyasya
GS40caraka_u:46_1: prakaraṇasamūhaviśeṣa eva dīrghaṃjīvitīyādilakṣaṇe paṅkajaśabdavadvartate na yogamātreṇa vartate // 38
GS40caraka_u:47: vakṣyati hi adhikṛtyeyamadhyāyanāmasaṃjñā pratiṣṭhitā iti nāmasaṃjñā yogarūḍhasaṃjñetyarthaḥ // 39
GS40caraka_u:53: cakṣiṅo hi prayoge'nicchato 'pi vyākhyātuḥ kriyāphalasambandhasya durnivāratvena svaritañita ityādinātmanepadaṃ syāditi // 45
GS40caraka_u:55: āṅayaṃ kriyāyoge ye tu maryādāyām abhividhau vā āṅprayogaṃ manyante teṣām abhiprāyaṃ na vidmaḥ // 47
GS40caraka_u:56: yato maryādāyāmabhividhau cāṅaḥ prātipadikena yogaḥ syāt yathā āsamudrakṣitīśānām āpāṭalīputrād vṛṣṭo deva ityādau ihāpi ca tathā // 48
GS40caraka_u:57: kriyāyogavirahe upasargāḥ kriyāyoge iti niyamād āṅa upasargatvaṃ na syāt tataścānupasargeṇāṅā vyavadhānād ver upasargasya prayogo na syāt // 49
GS40caraka_u:58: yenāvyavahitaḥ sajātīyavyavahito vā dhātor upasargo bhavati // 50
GS40caraka_u:59: vyāṅor ubhayor apyanupasargatve tatsambandhocitabhūriprātipadikakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgaḥ syāt tasmāt kriyāyogitvam evāṅo nyāyyam // 51
GS40caraka_u:60: atha ataḥ dīrghaṃ jīvitīyam adhyāyaṃ vi ā khyāsyāma ityaṣṭapadatvam // 52]
GS40caraka_u:63_1: yato na tāvad bheṣajādīnām aśeṣaviśeṣapratyakṣajñeyaḥ sarvapadārthānāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ
GS40caraka_u:63_2: pratyakṣāviṣayatvāt anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tu sarvapadārthāvadhāraṇaṃ duṣkarameva yata
GS40caraka_u:63_3: ekam eva madhu svarūpeṇa jīvayati mārayati coṣṇaṃ samaghṛtaṃ ca kaphaprakṛterhitamahitaṃ
GS40caraka_u:63_4: vātaprakṛteḥ anūpe sātmyamasātmyaṃ marau śīte sevyamasevyaṃ grīṣme hitam avṛddhe
GS40caraka_u:63_5: vṛddhe cāhitam alpaṃ guṇakaram ābādhakaram atyupayuktam āmatāṃ gatam udare upakramavirodhitvād
GS40caraka_u:63_6: ativibhramakaraṃ kākamācīyuktaṃ pakvanikucena ca sahopayuktaṃ maraṇāya athavā balavarṇavīryatejaupaghātāya
GS40caraka_u:63_7: bhavati ityevamādi tattad yuktaṃ tattacchataśaḥ karoti ata evaikasyaiva madhuno rūpaṃ
GS40caraka_u:63_8: yadānena prakāreṇa duradhigamaṃ tadātra kaiva kathā nikhilapadārthāśeṣaviśeṣajñānasya
GS40caraka_u:63_9: ajānaṃśca vyācakṣāṇaḥ kathamupādeyavacana iti kṛtvā guror āptāt pratipannaṃ pratipādayiṣyāma
GS40caraka_u:63_10: iti darśayan tāmimāṃ śaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣur gurūktānuvādarūpatāṃ svagranthasya darśayannāha
GS40caraka_u:64: atra itiśabdo vakṣyamāṇārthaparāmarśakaḥ haśabdo'vadhāraṇe yathā na ha vai saśarīrasya priyāpriyayorapahatirastīti atra na heti naivetyarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:65: atra smāha iti smaśabdaprayogena bhūtamātra eva liḍarthe laṭ sme iti laṭ na bhūtānadyatanaparokṣe ātreyopadeśasyāgniveśaṃ pratyaparokṣatvāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:66: yathā ca bhūtamātre liḍ bhavati tathāca darśayiṣyāmaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:67: bhagaṃ pūjitaṃ jñānaṃ tadvān yathoktam utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim // 5
GS40caraka_u:68: vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti yadi vā bhagaśabdaḥ samastaiśvaryamāhātmyādivacanaḥ yathoktam aiśvaryasya samagrasya vīryasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:71: atrānye varṇayanti caturvidhaṃ sūtraṃ bhavati gurusūtraṃ śiṣyasūtraṃ pratisaṃskartṛsūtram ekīyasūtraṃ ceti // 9
GS40caraka_u:72_0: tatra gurusūtraṃ yathā naitad buddhimatā draṣṭavyam agniveśa ityādi pratisaṃskartṛsūtraṃ
GS40caraka_u:72_1: yathā tamuvāca bhagavānātreyaḥ ityādi śiṣyasūtraṃ yathā naitāni bhagavan pañcakaṣāyaśatāni
GS40caraka_u:72_2: pūryante ityādi ekīyasūtraṃ yathā kumārasya śiraḥ pūrvamabhinirvartata iti kumāraśirā
GS40caraka_u:75: itiśabdena ca prakāravācinā dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti parāmṛśyate tenāha smeti bhūtānadyatanaparokṣa eva bhavati pratisaṃskartāraṃ pratyātreyopadeśasya parokṣatvāt // 12
GS40caraka_u:76: anena ca nyāyena tamuvāca bhagavānātreya ityādāv api liḍvidhir upapanno bhavati // 13
GS40caraka_u:77: suśrute ca yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ iti pratisaṃskartṛsūtramiti kṛtvā ṭīkākṛtā liḍvidhir upapāditaḥ iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:78_0: atra brūmaḥ yattāvaduktaṃ śiṣyasyāgniveśasya vyākhyānānadhikārādidaṃ guroḥ sūtraṃ
GS40caraka_u:78_1: tanna nahi jātyā gurutvam asti yataḥ sa evātreyaḥ svagurum apekṣya śiṣyaḥ agniveśādīn
GS40caraka_u:78_2: apekṣya guruḥ evamagniveśo 'pi granthakaraṇakāle svabuddhisthīkṛtāñśiṣyān prati gururiti
GS40caraka_u:79_1: tatra vicāryaṃ kim idaṃ dvitīyaṃ sūtraṃ pūrvavākyaikatāpannaṃ na vā yadyekavākyatāpannaṃ
GS40caraka_u:79_2: tadā suśrute tathā vyākhyāsyāmo yathovāca dhanvantarir iti yojanīyaṃ tathāca tathā
GS40caraka_u:79_3: vyākhyāsyāma iti kriyaikavākyatāpannam uvācetipadaṃ na bhinnakartṛkaṃ bhavitum arhati
GS40caraka_u:79_4: tathā ca kuto liḍvidhiḥ atha naikatāpannaṃ tadā gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo hastītivannārthasaṃgatiḥ // 16
GS40caraka_u:80: kiṃca jatūkarṇādau pratisaṃskartṛśrutigandho 'pi nāsti tat kathaṃ nānāśrutaparipūrṇakaṇṭhaḥ śiṣyo jatūkarṇaḥ prāñjalir adhigamyovāca ityādau liḍvidhiḥ // 17
GS40caraka_u:81_0: anena nyāyena carake 'pi pratisaṃskartṛsūtrapakṣe liḍvidhirnāsti tasmāccarake 'gniveśaḥ
GS40caraka_u:81_1: suśrute suśruta eva sūtrāṇāṃ praṇetā kvacit kiṃcidarthaṃ stotuṃ nindituṃ vākhyāyikārūpaṃ
GS40caraka_u:81_2: purākalpaṃ darśayan kimapi sūtraṃ gurūktānuvādarūpatayā kimapyekīyamatānuvādarūpatayā
GS40caraka_u:81_3: likhati pratisaṃskartā tv ayaṃ granthaṃ pūrayati tadādyagranthakartṛtayaiva // 18
GS40caraka_u:82_0: liḍvidhistu bhūtānadyatanamātra eva chandovihito bhāṣāyāmapi varṇanīyaḥ anyathā uvāceti
GS40caraka_u:82_1: padaṃ jatūkarṇādau na syāt tathā ca harivaṃśe dhanyopākhyāne māmuvāca iti tathā ahamuvāca
GS40caraka_u:82_2: iti ca na syāt yathā sa māmuvācāmbucaraḥ kūrmo mānuṣavat svayam // 19
GS40caraka_u:83: kimāścaryaṃ mayi mune dhanyaścāhaṃ kathaṃ vibho iti tathā svyambhuvacanāt so 'haṃ vedān vai samupasthitaḥ // 20
GS40caraka_u:85_0: yadapi iti ha smāha ityatra itiśabdena pūrvasūtraṃ parāmṛśyate tanna yena dīrghaṃjīvitīyādisūtramātrasya
GS40caraka_u:85_1: tadarthasya vā gurūktatvapratipādane sati naivottaratrābhidheyābhidhānena nikhilatantrasya
GS40caraka_u:86: bhavati tu bhāvayituṃ yathā purā vyākhyātaṃ tasmāttadeva nyāyyamiti // 23
GS40caraka_u:87: agniveśasya vyākhyāsyāma iti bahuvacanam ekasminn apy asmadaḥ prayogādbahuvacanaprayogasya sādhutvāt sādhu hi vadanti vaktāro vayaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ iti // 24
GS40caraka_u:88: bhagavānātreya ityatra tv ekavacananirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ bhagavānityanenaivātreyasya gurorgauravasya darśitatvāt // 25]
GS40caraka_u:92: jagrāha nikhilenādāv aśvinau tu punas tataḥ // Car_1,1.4
GS40caraka_u:98: sametāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ pārśve himavataḥ śubhe // Car_1,1.7
GS40caraka_u:100: ātreyo gautamaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ pulastyo nārado'sitaḥ // Car_1,1.8
GS40caraka_u:106: baḍiśaḥ śaralomā ca kāpyakātyāyanāv ubhau // Car_1,1.11
GS40caraka_u:108: śarkarākṣo hiraṇyākṣo lokākṣaḥ paiṅgireva ca // Car_1,1.12
GS40caraka_u:116: bahvṛṣīṇām atra kīrtanaṃ granthādau pāpakṣayahetutvena tathāyurvedasyaivaṃvidhamahāpuruṣasevitatvena sevyatvopadarśanārthaṃ ceti // 2
GS40caraka_u:117: eṣu ca madhye kecid yāyāvarāḥ kecicchālīnāḥ kecidayonijāḥ evaṃprakārāśca sarve mīlitā boddhavyāḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:118: bhikṣurityātreyaviśeṣaṇaṃ vakṣyati hi tanneti bhikṣur ātreyaḥ iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:128: atha te śaraṇaṃ śakraṃ dadṛśurdhyānacakṣuṣā // Car_1,1.17
GS40caraka_u:131: dhāraṇāddharmaḥ sa cātmasamavetaḥ kāryadarśanānumeyaḥ arthaḥ suvarṇādiḥ kāmyata ita kāmo vanitāpariṣvaṅgādiḥ mokṣaḥ saṃsāravimokṣaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:134: uttamamiti pradhānaṃ tenārogyaṃ caturvarge pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ rogagṛhītasya kvacidapi puruṣārthe 'samarthatvād ityuktam // 4
GS40caraka_u:135_0: tasyāpahartāra iti ārogyasyāpahartāraḥ idam eva ca rogāṇām ārogyāpaharaṇaṃ yad anarthalābhaḥ
GS40caraka_u:135_1: na punar utpanno rogaḥ paścād ārogyam apaharati bhāvābhāvayoḥ parasparābhāvātmakatvāt // 5
GS40caraka_u:136_0: śreyaso jīvitasya ceti śreyovajjīvitaṃ hitatvena sukhatvena cārthe daśamahāmūlīye
GS40caraka_u:136_1: vakṣyamāṇaṃ tasya jīvitasyāpahartāra iti yojanīyam aśreyojīvitamahitatvena duḥkhahetutayā
GS40caraka_u:137_0: atra sukhitajīvitopaghāto dharmādyupaghātenaiva labdhaḥ tena vayaṃ paśyāmaḥ śreyaḥśabdena
GS40caraka_u:137_1: sāmānye nābhyudayavācinā dharmādayo 'bhidhīyante jīvitaśabdena ca jīvitamātraṃ yato
GS40caraka_u:137_2: jīvitaṃ svarūpeṇaiva sarvaprāṇināṃ nirupādhyupādeyaṃ vacanaṃ hi ācakame ca brahmaṇa
GS40caraka_u:138: yattvatyantaduḥkhagṛhītasya jīvitaṃ jihāsitaṃ tatra duḥkhasyātyantajihāsitasyānyathā hātum aśakyatvāt priyamapi jīvitaṃ tyaktum icchati na svarūpeṇa // 8
GS40caraka_u:144: dhyānaṃ samādhiviśeṣaḥ tadupalabdhisādhanatvāccakṣur iva dhyānacakṣuḥ tena sa vakṣyati śamopāyaṃ yathāvad amaraprabhuḥ iti dhyānacakṣuṣā dadṛśuriti yojanā // 14]
GS40caraka_u:145: kaḥ sahasrākṣabhavanaṃ gacchet praṣṭuṃ śacīpatim // Car_1,1.18
GS40caraka_u:151: provāca vinayāddhīmān ṛṣīṇāṃ vākyam uttamam // Car_1,1.21
GS40caraka_u:157: athaiteṣu madhye bharadvājaḥ katham indram upāgamad ityāha ka ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:158: śacīpatim ityanena śacīsambhogavyāsaktam apyaham upāsituṃ kṣama iti bharadvājo darśayati // 2
GS40caraka_u:162: yathā subhikṣam ityāgataḥ yasmāt subhikṣaṃ tasmādāgata ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:163: niyojita iti caurādiko ṇica na hetau // 7
GS40caraka_u:164: anena prakaraṇena bharadvājasyāyurvedāgame viśeṣeṇārthitvānna preraṇamiti darśitaṃ bhavati // 8
GS40caraka_u:165: provāceti samyaguvāca na tu praśabdaḥ prapañcārthaḥ padairalpair ityuktatvāt // 9
GS40caraka_u:166_0: kasmāt padair alpair uvācetyāha matiṃ buddhvā vipulām iti yasmād vipulamatiṃ bharadvājaṃ

GS40caraka_u:350_2: balavarṇasukhopapannam āyuṣā mahatopapādayanti samyagevācaritā dharmārthakāmā iva
GS40caraka_u:350_3: niḥśreyasena mahatā puruṣamiha cāmuṣmiṃś ca loke vikṛtāstvenaṃ mahatā viparyayeṇopapādayanti
GS40caraka_u:350_4: kratavas traya iva vikṛtimāpannā lokamaśubhenopaghātakāla iti // Car_1,12.13
GS40caraka_u:351: tadṛṣayaḥ sarva evānumenire vacanamātreyasya bhagavato'bhinananduś ceti // Car_1,12.14
GS40caraka_u:354: guṇāḥ ṣaḍ dvividho hetur vividhaṃ karma yat punaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:355: vāyoścaturvidhaṃ karma pṛthak ca kaphapittayoḥ // Car_1,12.16
GS40caraka_u:357: kalākalīye vātasya tat sarvaṃ saṃprakāśitam // Car_1,12.17
GS40caraka_u:364: tatrāpi vipākādīnāmapi rasenaiva prāyo lakṣaṇīyatvādrasaprakaraṇam ādau kṛtam // 2]
GS40caraka_u:367: yaḥ kumāraśirā nāma bharadvājaḥ sa cānaghaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:368: śrīmān vāyorvidaścaiva rājā matimatāṃ varaḥ // Car_1,26.4
GS40caraka_u:377: rasenāhāraviniścayo rasāhāraviniścayaḥ kiṃvā ayaṃ rasaviniścayaḥ tathā paraṃ cāto vipākānām ityādirāhāraviniścayaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:378: eka eva rasa ityuvāca bhadrakāpyaḥ yaṃ pañcānām indriyārthānām anyatamaṃ jihvāvaiṣayikaṃ bhāvamācakṣate kuśalāḥ sa punarudakādananya iti /
GS40caraka_u:379: dvau rasāv iti śākunteyo brāhmaṇaḥ chedanīya upaśamanīyaśceti /
GS40caraka_u:380: trayo rasā iti pūrṇākṣo maudgalyaḥ chedanīyopaśamanīyasādhāraṇā iti /
GS40caraka_u:381: catvāro rasā iti hiraṇyākṣaḥ kauśikaḥ svādurhitaśca svādur ahitaś cāsvādur hitaścāsvādur ahitaśceti /
GS40caraka_u:382: pañca rasā iti kumāraśirā bharadvājaḥ bhaumaudakāgneyavāyavyāntarikṣāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:386: aparisaṃkhyeyā rasā iti kāṅkāyano vāhlīkabhiṣak āśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādaviśeṣāṇām aparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // Car_1,26.8
GS40caraka_u:390: anyatamam iti ekam anyaśabdo hy ayamekavacanaḥ yathānyo dakṣiṇena gato 'nya uttareṇa eka ityarthaḥ tam appratyayaśca svārthikaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:393: udakādananya iti rasodakayor ekatvakhyāpanārthaṃ pūrvapakṣatvād aduṣṭam // 6
GS40caraka_u:395: hi rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātram ityādivacanena guṇāvyatiriktaṃ dravyamiti bruvate // 8
GS40caraka_u:398: sādhāraṇa ityāgneyasaumyasāmānyād ubhayor api laṅghanabṛṃhaṇayoḥ kartā parasparavirodhādakartā vā // 11
GS40caraka_u:399: svāduriti abhīṣṭaḥ hita iti āyatāv anapakārī // 12
GS40caraka_u:400: āśrīyata ityāśrayo dravyaṃ guṇāḥ snigdhagurvādayaḥ karma dhātuvardhanakṣapaṇādi saṃsvādaḥ rasānām avāntarabhedaḥ eṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ bhedānām ityarthaḥ // 13
GS40caraka_u:401: tatra dravyabhedād ādhārabhedenāśritasyāpi rasasya bhedo bhavati āśrayo hi kāraṇaṃ kāraṇabhedācca kāryabhedo 'vaśyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 14
GS40caraka_u:403: tataś ca kāryabhedādavaśyaṃ kāraṇabheda iti pūrvapakṣābhiprāyaḥ // 16
GS40caraka_u:404_0: saṃsvādabhedastu ekasyām api madhurajātāv ikṣukṣīraguḍādigataḥ pratyakṣameva bhedo
GS40caraka_u:404_1: dṛśyate sa tu saṃsvādabhedaḥ svasaṃvedya eva yaduktam ikṣukṣīraguḍādīnāṃ mādhuryasyāntaraṃ mahat // 17
GS40caraka_u:406: ṣaḍeva rasā ityuvāca bhagavānātreyaḥ punarvasuḥ madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:407_0: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ yonirudakaṃ chedanopaśamane dve karmaṇī tayor miśrībhāvāt sādhāraṇatvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:407_1: svādvasvādutā bhaktiḥ hitāhitau prabhāvau pañcamahābhūtavikārās tv āśrayāḥ prakṛtivikṛtivicāradeśakālavaśāḥ
GS40caraka_u:407_2: teṣvāśrayeṣu dravyasaṃjñakeṣu guṇā gurulaghuśītoṣṇasnigdharūkṣādyāḥ kṣaraṇāt kṣāraḥ
GS40caraka_u:407_3: nāsau rasaḥ dravyaṃ tadanekarasasamutpannam anekarasaṃ kaṭukalavaṇabhūyiṣṭham anekendriyārthasamanvitaṃ
GS40caraka_u:407_4: karaṇābhinirvṛttam avyaktībhāvastu khalu rasānāṃ prakṛtau bhavatyanurase 'nurasasamanvite
GS40caraka_u:407_5: vā dravye aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ punas teṣām āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvānna
GS40caraka_u:407_6: yuktam ekaiko 'pi hy eṣām āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ viśeṣān āśrayate viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt
GS40caraka_u:407_7: na ca tasmād anyatvam upapadyate parasārasaṃsṛṣṭabhūyiṣṭhatvānna caiṣām abhinirvṛtter
GS40caraka_u:407_8: guṇaprakṛtīnām aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ bhavati tasmānna saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ karmopadiśanti buddhimantaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:408: taccaiva kāraṇamapekṣamāṇāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ paraspareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ lakṣaṇapṛthaktvam upadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_1,26.9
GS40caraka_u:412: yoniḥ ādhārakāraṇaṃ kāryakāraṇayośca bhedāt siddha udakādrasabhedaḥ pratyakṣa eveti bhāvaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:413: kṣitivyatiriktam udakameva yathā rasayonistathā rasanārtho rasastasya ityādau vivṛtameva dīrghaṃjīvitīye // 4
GS40caraka_u:414: tayormiśrībhāvāditi karmaṇor amūrtayor miśrībhāvānupapattau tadādhārayor dravyayor miśrībhāvāditi boddhavyam // 5
GS40caraka_u:417: tena yo yamicchati sa tasya svādurasvāduritara iti puruṣāpekṣau dharmau na rasabhedakāryāv ityarthaḥ // 8
GS40caraka_u:418: pañcamahābhūtetyādau tuśabdo 'vadhāraṇe tena āśrayā eva na rasā ityarthaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:419: kiṃbhūtā bhaumādayo bhūtavikārā āśrayā ityāha prakṛtivikṛtivicāradeśakālavaśā iti vaśaśabdo 'dhīnārthaḥ sa ca prakṛtyādibhiḥ pratyekaṃ yojyaḥ // 10
GS40caraka_u:420_0: tatra prakṛtivaśā yathā mudgāḥ kaṣāyā madhurāśca santaḥ prakṛtyā laghavaḥ etaddhi
GS40caraka_u:420_1: lāghavaṃ na rasavaśaṃ tathāhi sati kaṣāyamadhuratvād gurutvaṃ syāt vikṛtivaśaṃ ca
GS40caraka_u:420_2: vrīher lājānāṃ laghutvaṃ tathā saktusiddhapiṇḍakānāṃ ca gurutvaṃ vicāraṇā vicāro
GS40caraka_u:420_3: dravyāntarasaṃyoga ityarthaḥ tena vicāraṇāvaśaṃ yathā madhusarpiṣī saṃyukte viṣaṃ
GS40caraka_u:420_4: tathā viṣaṃ cāgadasaṃyuktaṃ svakāryavyatiriktakāryakāri deśo dvividho bhūmir āturaśca
GS40caraka_u:420_5: tatra bhūmau śvetakāpotī valmīkādhirūḍhā viṣaharī tathā himavati bheṣajāni mahāguṇāni
GS40caraka_u:420_6: bhavanti śarīradeśe yathā sakthimāṃsād gurutaraṃ skandhakroḍaśiraspadām ityādi kālavaśaṃ
GS40caraka_u:420_7: tu yathā mūlakamadhikṛtyoktaṃ tadbālaṃ doṣaharaṃ vṛddhaṃ tridoṣaṃ tathā yathartupuṣpaphalam
GS40caraka_u:421: atra caikaprakaraṇoktā ye 'nuktās te cakārāt svabhāvādiṣvevāntarbhāvanīyāḥ // 12
GS40caraka_u:422: yaduktaṃ caraḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ svabhāvo dhātavaḥ kriyāḥ // 13
GS40caraka_u:423: liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ saṃskāro mātrā cāsmin parīkṣyate iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:424_0: tatra caraśarīrāvayavadhātūnāṃ deśena grahaṇaṃ mātrā vicāre praviśati śeṣaṃ svabhāve
GS40caraka_u:424_1: tathā rasavimāne vakṣyamāṇaṃ cātrāpraviṣṭam āhāraviśeṣāyatanam antarbhāvanīyaṃ yathāsambhavam // 15
GS40caraka_u:425: snigdharūkṣādyā ityatrādigrahaṇenānuktā api tīkṣṇamṛdvādayo na rasāḥ kiṃtu dravyaguṇāḥ pṛthageveti darśayati // 16
GS40caraka_u:426: kṣaraṇāt adhogamanakriyāyogāt kṣāro dravyaṃ nāsau rasaḥ rasasya hi niṣkriyasya kriyānupapannetyarthaḥ // 17
GS40caraka_u:427: kṣaraṇaṃ ca kṣārasya pānīyayuktasyādhogamanena vadanti hi laukikāḥ kṣāraṃ srāvayāmaḥ iti śāstraṃ ca chittvā chittvāśayāt kṣāraḥ kṣaratvāt kṣārayatyadhaḥ iti // 18
GS40caraka_u:428_0: hetvantaram āha dravyaṃ tadanekarasotpannam iti anekarasebhyo muṣkakāpāmārgādibhya
GS40caraka_u:428_1: utpannam anekarasotpannaṃ yataś cānekarasotpannam ata evānekarasaṃ kāraṇaguṇānuvidhāyitvāt
GS40caraka_u:432: kṣāro hi sparśena gandhena cānvitaḥ tena dravyaṃ rase hi guṇe na sparśo nāpi gandha iti bhāvaḥ // 23
GS40caraka_u:433: hetvantaramāha karaṇābhinirvṛttamiti karaṇena bhasmaparisrāvaṇādinābhinirvṛttaṃ kṛtam ityarthaḥ na raso 'nena prakāreṇa kriyata iti bhāvaḥ // 24
GS40caraka_u:435: avyaktībhāva ityabhūtatadbhāve cvipratyayena rasānāṃ madhurādīnāṃ vyaktānām eva kvacidādhāre 'vyaktatvaṃ nānyo madhurādibhyo 'vyaktarasa ityarthaḥ // 26
GS40caraka_u:439_0: avyaktatvaṃ ca rasasāmānyamātropalabdhir madhurādiviśeṣaśūnyā sā ca jale bhavati
GS40caraka_u:439_1: yata uktaṃ jalaguṇakathane suśrute vyaktarasatā rasadoṣaḥ iti ihāpi ca avyaktarasaṃ
GS40caraka_u:439_2: ca iti vakṣyati loke'pi cāvyaktarasaṃ dravyamāsvādya vaktāro vadanti jalasyevāsya
GS40caraka_u:439_3: raso na kaścin madhurādir vyakta iti // 30
GS40caraka_u:441_0: yathā dūrād avijñāyamānaviśeṣavarṇe vastuni rūpasāmānyapratītir bhavati na śuklatvādiviśeṣabuddhiḥ
GS40caraka_u:442: yaduktaṃ rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyānuraso madhuraḥ kaphapittahā iti // 33
GS40caraka_u:443: anurasasamanvita iti sarvānurasayukte yathā viṣe vacanaṃ hi uṣṇam anirdeśyarasam ityādi // 34
GS40caraka_u:444: kiṃvā aṇurasasamanvite iti pāṭhas tena aṇurasenaikena maricena śarkarāpānake kaṭutvam avyaktaṃ syāt // 35
GS40caraka_u:446: teṣāmiti rasānām aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ na yuktam āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāmiti āśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādānām viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvāditi āśrayādibhedasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // 37
GS40caraka_u:448: eṣāmāśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādānāṃ viśeṣān ekaiko 'pi madhurādir āśrayate na ca tasmād āśrayādibhedād anyatvam āśritasya madhurāder bhavati // 39
GS40caraka_u:449: evaṃ manyate yadyapi śālimudgaghṛtakṣīrādayo madhurasyāśrayā bhinnāḥ tathāpi tatra madhuratvajātyākrānta eka eva raso bhavati balākākṣīrakārpāsādiṣu śuklavarṇa iva // 40
GS40caraka_u:450_0: tathā guṇānāṃ gurupicchilasnigdhādīnāmanyatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ vā rasādivardhanāyurjananavarṇakaratvādīnāṃ
GS40caraka_u:450_1: bhinnatve satyapi na madhurarasasyānyatvaṃ yata eka eva madhuras tattadguṇayukto
GS40caraka_u:451: tathā madhurasyāvāntarāsvādabhede 'pi madhuratvajātyanatikramaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇāvāntarabhede yathā kṛṣṇatvānatikramaḥ // 42
GS40caraka_u:452_0: nanu maivaṃ bhavatv aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ rasānāṃ parasparasaṃyogāt tu ya āsvādaviśeṣaḥ
GS40caraka_u:452_1: sa kāryaviśeṣakaro 'pi na hi yanmadhurāmlena kriyate tanmadhureṇa vāmlena vā śakyam
GS40caraka_u:453_0: saṃsṛṣṭam iti bhāve ktaḥ tena parasparasaṃsargabhūyiṣṭhatvād eṣāṃ madhurādīnām abhinirvṛtterna
GS40caraka_u:453_1: guṇaprakṛtīnām asaṃkhyeyatvam iti yojanā ayamarthaḥ yadyapi rasāḥ parasparasaṃsargeṇātibhūyasā
GS40caraka_u:453_2: yuktāḥ santo 'bhinirvṛttā dvirasādau dravye bhavanti tathāpi na teṣāṃ guṇā gurulaghvādayaḥ
GS40caraka_u:453_3: prakṛtayo vā madhurādīnāṃ yā yā āyuṣyatvarasābhivardhakatvādyās tā asaṃkhyeyā bhavanti
GS40caraka_u:453_4: kiṃtu ya eva madhurādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtayaśca uddiṣṭāsta eva miśrā bhavanti // 44
GS40caraka_u:454: kiṃvā guṇaprakṛtīnāmiti madhurādiṣaḍguṇasvarūpāṇām ityarthaḥ tena rasasya rasāntarasaṃsarge doṣāṇāmiva doṣāntarasaṃsarge rasānāṃ nāparisaṃkhyeyatvam ityarthaḥ // 45
GS40caraka_u:455: prakṛtiśabdena karma vocyate tena guṇakarmaṇām ityarthaḥ // 46
GS40caraka_u:457: yata eva heto rasānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ nānye guṇakarmaṇī bhavataḥ ata eva saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ pṛthakkarma śāstrāntare 'pi noktam ityāha tasmād ityādi // 48
GS40caraka_u:458: karmaśabdeneha gauravalāghavādikārakā gurutvādayo rasaraktādijananādayaś cāpi boddhavyāḥ // 49
GS40caraka_u:459: na kevalam anyaśāstrakārai rasānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ karma nopadiṣṭaṃ kiṃtu vayamapi nopadekṣyāma ityāha taccaivetyādi // 50
GS40caraka_u:462: tatra lakṣyate yena tallakṣaṇam atastu madhuro rasaḥ ityādinā granthena tathā snehanaprīṇanahlādana ityādinā ca yadvācyaṃ tat sarvaṃ gṛhyate // 53
GS40caraka_u:463: kiṃvā lakṣaṇaśabdena madhuro rasa ityādigranthavācyaṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate pṛthaktvaṃ ca rasabhedajñānārthaṃ yad vakṣyati snehanaprīṇana ityādi tad gṛhyate // 54]
GS40caraka_u:464: agre tu tāvad dravyabhedam abhipretya kiṃcid abhidhāsyāmaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:465: sarvaṃ dravyaṃ pāñcabhautikamasminnarthe taccetanāvadacenaṃ ca tasya guṇāḥ śabdādayo gurvādayaś ca dravāntāḥ karma pañcavidhamuktaṃ vamanādi // Car_1,26.10
GS40caraka_u:468: raseṣu vācyeṣu dravyabhedam abhipretya pratipādanīyatayā parigṛhya rasānāṃ dravyajñānādhīnajñānatvād dravyābhidhānam agre kṛtam ityarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:469: kiṃciditi āyurvedopayogidravyasvarūpaṃ na sarvam aprasaṅgadoṣād iti bhāvaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:472: dravāntā iti vacanena pūrvoktān viṃśatiguṇān āha // 5
GS40caraka_u:473_0: atra ca paratvāparatvādīnām ihānabhidhānena cikitsāyāṃ paratvādīnām aprādhānyaṃ darśayati
GS40caraka_u:473_2: te pārthivādidravyāṇāṃ śabdādivat sāṃsiddhikāḥ kiṃ tarhy ādheyāḥ ata iha naisargikaguṇakathane noktāḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:478_0: bahulaśabdo gurvādibhiḥ pratyekaṃ sambadhyate kiṃvā gandhenaiva yato gandhaguṇabahulā
GS40caraka_u:478_1: pṛthivyeva bhavati ata eva dravyāntaralakṣaṇe 'pi vaiśeṣikaguṇo 'nta eva paṭhyate
GS40caraka_u:478_2: rasaguṇabahulāni ityādi tena tatrāpi rasādibhir eva bahulaśabdo yojyaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:483: prabhā varṇaprakāśinī dīptiḥ yaduktaṃ varṇamākrāmati chāyā prabhā varṇaprakāśikā ityādi // 6
GS40caraka_u:486: atrākāśabāhulyaṃ dravyasya pṛthivyādibhūtāntarālpatvena bhūrivyaktākāśatvena ca jñeyaṃ yadeva bhūriśuṣiraṃ tannābhasaṃ kiṃvā ākāśaguṇabahulatvena nābhasaṃ dravyam ityucyate // 9]
GS40caraka_u:487: anenopadeśena nānauṣadhibhūtaṃ jagati kiṃcid dravyam upalabhyate tāṃ tāṃ yuktim arthaṃ ca taṃ tam abhipretya // Car_1,26.12
GS40caraka_u:489: aneneti pratiniyatadravyaguṇopadeśena yat pārthivādi dravyaṃ yadguṇaṃ tadguṇe dehe saṃpādye tad bheṣajaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:490: tacca pārthivādi dravyaṃ na sarvathā na ca sarvasmin vyādhau bheṣajamityāha tāṃ tāṃ yuktim ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:491: yuktim iti upāyam arthamiti prayojanam abhipretyeti adhikṛtya tena kenacidupāyena kvacit prayojane kiṃcid dravyamauṣadhaṃ bhavati na sarvatra // 3
GS40caraka_u:492_0: tena yaducyate vairodhikānāṃ sarvadāpathyatvena nānauṣadhaṃ dravyam iti vaco virodhi
GS40caraka_u:492_1: tanna bhavati vairodhikāni hi saṃyogasaṃskāradeśakālādyapekṣāṇi bhavanti vairodhikasaṃyogādyabhāve
GS40caraka_u:493: yānyapi sarvadāpi svabhāvādeva viṣamandakādīnyapathyāni tānyapy upāyayuktāni kvacit pathyāni bhavanti yathā udare viṣasya tilaṃ dadyāt ityādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:494: yattu tṛṇapāṃśuprabhṛtīni nopayujyante ato na tāni bheṣajānītyucyate tanna teṣāmapi bheṣajasvedādyupāyatvena bheṣajatvāt // 6]
GS40caraka_u:495_0: na tu kevalaṃ guṇaprabhāvādeva dravyāṇi kārmukāṇi bhavanti dravyāṇi hi dravyaprabhāvād
GS40caraka_u:495_1: guṇaprabhāvād dravyaguṇaprabhāvāc ca tasmiṃstasmin kāle tattadadhikaraṇam āsādya
GS40caraka_u:495_2: tāṃ tāṃ ca yuktimarthaṃ ca taṃ tamabhipretya yat kurvanti tat karma yena kurvanti
GS40caraka_u:495_3: tadvīryaṃ yatra kurvanti tadadhikaraṇaṃ yadā kurvanti sa kālaḥ yathā kurvanti sa
GS40caraka_u:495_4: upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti tat phalam // Car_1,26.13
GS40caraka_u:497: pārthivādidravyāṇāṃ gurukharādiguṇayogād bheṣajatvam uktaṃ tena guṇaprabhāvādeva bheṣajaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ nirasyann āha na tu kevalam ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:498: dravyaprabhāvād yathā dantyā virecakatvaṃ tathā maṇīnāṃ viṣādihantṛtvam ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:499: guṇaprabhāvādyathā jvare tiktako rasaḥ śīte 'gnir ityādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:500_0: dravyaguṇaprabhāvād yathā kṛṣṇājinasyoparīti atrāpi kṛṣṇatvaṃ guṇo'jinaṃ ca dravyamabhipretaṃ
GS40caraka_u:500_1: yathā vā maṇḍalair jātarūpasya tasyā eva payaḥ śṛtam tatra maṇḍalaguṇayuktasyaiva
GS40caraka_u:502: tāṃ tāṃ yuktimāsādyeti tāṃ tāṃ yojanāṃ prāpya // 6
GS40caraka_u:503_0: yat kurvantītyādāv udāharaṇaṃ yathā śirovirecanadravyāṇi yacchirovirecanaṃ kurvanti
GS40caraka_u:503_1: tac chirovirecanaṃ karma yenoṣṇatvādikāraṇena śirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tadvīryaṃ vīryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:503_2: śaktiḥ sā ca dravyasya guṇasya vā yatra śirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tadadhikaraṇaṃ śiraḥ
GS40caraka_u:503_3: nānyatrādhikaraṇe śirovirecanadravyaṃ prabhavatītyarthaḥ yadeti vasantādau śirogauravādiyukte
GS40caraka_u:503_4: ca kāle etenākāle śīte śirovirecanaṃ stabdhatvānna kārmukaṃ kiṃtu svakāla eva yathā
GS40caraka_u:503_5: yena prakāreṇa pradhamanāvapīḍanādinā tathā prasāritāṅgamuttānaṃ śayane saṃstarāstṛte // 7
GS40caraka_u:504: īṣat pralambaśirasaṃ saṃveśya cāvṛtekṣaṇam ityādinā vidhinā kurvanti sa upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti śirogauravaśūlādyuparamaṃ tat phalaṃ phalam uddeśyam // 8
GS40caraka_u:505: karma kāryaṃ sādhanam uddeśyaṃ phalaṃ sādhyaṃ yathā yāganiṣpādyo dharmaḥ kāryatayā karma tajjanyastu svargādir uddeśyaḥ phalam evaṃ vamanādiṣvapi karmādhikaraṇādyunneyam // 9]
GS40caraka_u:506: bhedaś caiṣāṃ triṣaṣṭividhavikalpo dravyadeśakālaprabhāvād bhavati tam upadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_1,26.14
GS40caraka_u:508: samprati dravyam abhidhāya vikṛtānāṃ rasānām eva bhedam āha bhedaś caiṣām ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:509_0: prabhāvaśabdo dravyadeśakālaiḥ pratyekaṃ yujyate tatra dravyaprabhāvād yathā somaguṇātirekān
GS40caraka_u:509_1: madhuraḥ ityādi deśaprabhāvād yathā himavati drākṣādāḍimādīni madhurāṇi bhavantyanyatrāmlānītyādi
GS40caraka_u:509_2: kālaprabhāvādyathā bālāmraṃ sakaṣāyaṃ taruṇamamlaṃ pakvaṃ madhuraṃ tathā hemante
GS40caraka_u:510: agnisaṃyogādayo ye 'nye rasahetavas te 'pi kāle dravye vāntarbhāvanīyāḥ // 3]
GS40caraka_u:512: yānti pañcadaśaitāni dravyāṇi dvirasāni tu // Car_1,26.15
GS40caraka_u:515_0: tatra svādoramlādiyogāt pañca śeṣair iti āditvenopayuktād anyaiḥ tenāmlasya lavaṇādiyogāc
GS40caraka_u:515_1: catvāri evaṃ lavaṇasya kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi kaṭukasya tiktakaṣāyayogād dve tiktasya
GS40caraka_u:517: madhurasya tathāmlasya lavaṇasya kaṭos tathā // Car_1,26.16
GS40caraka_u:521_0: madhurasyāmlādirasacatuṣṭayena pṛthag ityekaikaśo yuktasya śeṣairlavaṇādibhir yogo
GS40caraka_u:521_1: bhavati tatra madhurasyāmlayuktasya śeṣalavaṇādiyogāc catvāri tathā madhurasya lavaṇayuktasya
GS40caraka_u:521_2: kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭuyuktasya tiktādiyogād dve tathā tiktayuktasya kaṣāyayogād
GS40caraka_u:522: evamamlasyādisthitasya lavaṇayuktasya kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭukayuktasya śeṣābhyāṃ yogād dve evaṃ tiktayuktasya kaṣāyayogād ekam evam amlasya ṣaṭ // 3
GS40caraka_u:523: anenaiva nyāyena lavaṇasya trīṇi kaṭoś caikameva evaṃ militvā trirasāni viṃśatiḥ // 4]
GS40caraka_u:524: vakṣyante tu catuṣkeṇa dravyāṇi daśa pañca ca // Car_1,26.17
GS40caraka_u:528: yuktau śeṣaiḥ pṛthagyogaṃ yātaḥ svādūṣaṇau tathā // Car_1,26.19
GS40caraka_u:530: yātaḥ śeṣaiḥ pṛthagyogaṃ śeṣairamlakaṭū tathā // Car_1,26.20
GS40caraka_u:533: catūrase svādvamlāv ādisthitau lavaṇādibhir ekaikaśyena yuktau śeṣaiḥ kaṭvādibhir yogāt ṣaḍ bhavanti // 1
GS40caraka_u:534: svādulavaṇau sahitau ādisthitau kaṭvādibhiriti kaṭutiktābhyāṃ pṛthagyuktau śeṣair iti tiktakaṣāyābhyāṃ teneha bahuvacanaṃ jātau boddhavyam evaṃ trīṇi // 2
GS40caraka_u:537: amlalavaṇau saṃyuktau kaṭunā sahitau śeṣābhyāṃ yogād dve tathāmlalavaṇau tiktayuktau śeṣayogād ekam // 5
GS40caraka_u:542: ṣaṭ caivaikarasāni syur ekaṃ ṣaḍrasameva tu /
GS40caraka_u:545: atra ca rasānāṃ guṇatvenaikasmin dravye samavāyo yogaśabdenocyate // 2]
GS40caraka_u:548: rasāstaratamābhyāṃ tāṃ saṃkhyām atipatanti hi // Car_1,26.23
GS40caraka_u:550: rasasaṃsargasya prakārāntareṇāsaṃkhyeyatām āha triṣaṣṭiḥ syād ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:552: atra ca triṣaṣṭyātmakarase rasānurasakalpanā nāsti kevale madhurādau tadabhāvāt tena yathāsambhavaṃ saptapañcāśatsaṃyogaviṣayaṃ rasānurasakalpanaṃ jñeyam // 3
GS40caraka_u:554: prakārāntareṇāpy asaṃkhyeyatām āha rasās taratamābhyām ityādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:556: kiṃvā rasānurasatvenaiva yāsaṃkhyeyatā tatraivāyaṃ hetuḥ rasās taratamābhyāmityādiḥ // 7]
GS40caraka_u:560: evamasaṃkhyeyatve'pi triṣaṣṭividhaiva kalpanā cikitsāvyavahārārtham ihācāryaiḥ kalpitetyāha saṃyogā ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:561: tatra yogyatvād iti tatra svasthāturahitacikitsāprayoge 'natisaṃkṣepavistararūpatayā hitatvād ityarthaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:562: kvacideko rasaḥ kalpyaḥ saṃyuktāś ca rasāḥ kvacit /
GS40caraka_u:565: rasān ekaikaśo vāpi kalpayanti gadān prati // Car_1,26.26
GS40caraka_u:569: etadeva saṃyuktāsaṃyuktarasakalpanaṃ bhinnarasadravyamelakād vānekarasaikadravyaprayogād ekarasadravyaprayogādvā bhavatīti darśayannāha dravyāṇītyādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:570: dvirasādīni utpattisiddhadvirasatrirasādīni dvirasaṃ yathā kaṣāyamadhuro mudgaḥ trirasaṃ yathā madhurāmlakaṣāyaṃ ca viṣṭambhi guru śītalam // 4
GS40caraka_u:571_0: pittaśleṣmaharaṃ bhavyam ityādi catūrasas tilaḥ yad uktaṃ snigdhoṣṇamadhuras tiktaḥ
GS40caraka_u:571_1: kaṣāyaḥ kaṭukas tilaḥ pañcarasaṃ tv āmalakaṃ harītakī ca śivā pañcarasā ityādivacanāt
GS40caraka_u:571_2: vyaktaṣaḍrasaṃ tu dravyam ihānuktaṃ viṣaṃ tv avyaktaṣaḍrasasaṃyuktaṃ hārīte tv eṇamāṃsaṃ
GS40caraka_u:573: tathā saṃyuktāṃśca rasāniti ekaikarasādidravyamelakāt saṃyuktān rasān ekaikaśaḥ kalpayanti prayojayanti // 7
GS40caraka_u:574_0: gadān pratīti prādhānyena tena svasthavṛtte 'pi boddhavyaṃ kiṃvā dvirasādibhedo gada
GS40caraka_u:574_1: eva svasthe tu sarvarasaprayoga eva yaduktaṃ samasarvarasaṃ sātmyaṃ samadhātoḥ praśasyate iti // 8
GS40caraka_u:575: evaṃ ca vyākhyāne sati kvacideko rasa ityādinā samamasya na paunaruktyam // 9
GS40caraka_u:576_0: kiṃvā kvacid eko rasaḥ ityādinā svamatam uktam atraivārthe dravyāṇi dvirasādīni ityādinācāryāntarasammatiṃ
GS40caraka_u:576_1: darśayati ata evānyācāryāntarābhiprāyeṇa kalpayantītyuktaṃ tena na paunaruktyam // 10]
GS40caraka_u:578: na sa muhyed vikārāṇāṃ hetuliṅgopaśāntiṣu // Car_1,26.27
GS40caraka_u:581: atra rasavikalpajñānādeva vyādhihetudravyajñānaṃ kṛtsnamavaruddhaṃ rasajñānenaiva prāyaḥ sakaladravyaguṇasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt // 2
GS40caraka_u:582: doṣavikalpajñānācca liṅgajñānaṃ yāvaddhi liṅgaṃ tat sarvaṃ doṣavikalpasambaddham // 3
GS40caraka_u:583: rasadoṣavikalpajñānāt tu bheṣajajñānaṃ yato rasataḥ svarūpajñānaṃ bheṣajadravyasya doṣataśca bheṣajaprayogaviṣayavijñānam // 4
GS40caraka_u:584: kiṃvā rasavikalpāc ca tathā doṣavikalpāc ca hetvādijñānaṃ pṛthageva vaktavyaṃ rasabhedāddhi tatkāryaṃ liṅgamapi jñāyate hetubheṣajavijñānaṃ tu // 5
GS40caraka_u:585_0: rasabhedavijñānādeva vaktavyaṃ yato rasabhedavad dravyameva vikārāṇāṃ heturbheṣajaṃ
GS40caraka_u:585_1: ca bhavatīti evaṃ doṣabhedaṃ jñātvā ca tasya samānaṃ hetuṃ pratyeti doṣavirodhi ca
GS40caraka_u:586: tad yuktam uktaṃ na sa muhyedvikārāṇāṃ hetuliṅgopaśāntiṣviti // 7]
GS40caraka_u:587: vyaktaḥ śuṣkasya cādau ca raso dravyasya lakṣyate /
GS40caraka_u:588: viparyayeṇānuraso raso nāsti hi saptamaḥ // Car_1,26.28
GS40caraka_u:591_0: śuṣkasya ceti cakārād ārdrasya ca ādau ceti cakārādante ca tena śuṣkasya vārdrasya
GS40caraka_u:591_1: vā prathamajihvāsambandhe vāsvādānte vā yo vyaktatvena madhuro 'yam amlo 'yam ityādinā
GS40caraka_u:591_2: vikalpena gṛhyate sa vyaktaḥ yas tūktāvasthācatuṣṭaye 'pi vyakto nopalabhyate kiṃ
GS40caraka_u:591_3: tarhy avyapadeśyatayā chāyāmātreṇa kāryadarśanena vā mīyate so 'nurasa iti vākyārthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:592: yataśca madhurādaya eva vyaktatvāvyaktatvābhyāṃ rasānurasarūpāḥ ato'vyakto nāma saptamo raso nāsti // 3
GS40caraka_u:593: ayaṃ cārthaḥ pūrvaṃ pratiṣiddho 'pyanuguṇaspaṣṭahetuprāptyā punar niṣidhyate // 4
GS40caraka_u:594_0: anye tv āhuḥ śuṣkasya cetyanena yasya dravyasya śuṣkasya cārdrasya copayogaḥ tatra
GS40caraka_u:594_1: śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ yo 'vyaktaḥ sa rasa ucyate yastvārdrāvasthāyāṃ vyaktaḥ san śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:595_0: yathā pippalyā ārdrāyā madhuro raso vyaktaḥ śuṣkāyāstu pippalyāḥ kaṭukaḥ tena kaṭuka
GS40caraka_u:595_1: eva rasaḥ pippalyāḥ madhurastvanurasaḥ yastu drākṣādīnām ārdrāvasthāyāṃ śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ
GS40caraka_u:595_2: ca madhura eva tatra vipratipattirapi nāsti tena tatra madhura eva rasaḥ nityārdraprayojyānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:595_3: tu kāñjikatakrādīnāmādau vyakto ya upalabhyate rasaḥ anu copalabhyate yaḥ so 'nuraso
GS40caraka_u:595_4: yuktas tiktatvādiḥ tathā ārdrāvasthāyāṃ śuṣkāvasthāviparīto yaḥ pippalyā iva madhuraḥ so 'nurasa iti // 6
GS40caraka_u:596_0: kiṃtv ārdrāpi pippalī madhurarasaiveti paśyāmaḥ yato vakṣyati śleṣmalā madhurā cārdrā
GS40caraka_u:596_1: gurvī snigdhā ca pippalī iti madhurasya tatrānurasatve gurutvaśleṣmakartṛtvāny anupapannāni
GS40caraka_u:596_2: tena ārdrā pippalī vyaktamadhurarasaiva śuṣkā tu madhurānuraseti yuktam // 7]
GS40caraka_u:597: parāparatve yuktiśca saṃkhyā saṃyoga eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:598: vibhāgaśca pṛthaktvaṃ ca parimāṇamathāpi ca // Car_1,26.29
GS40caraka_u:602: parāparatve yuktiśca yojanā yā tu yujyate // Car_1,26.31
GS40caraka_u:603: saṃkhyā syādgaṇitaṃ yogaḥ saha saṃyoga ucyate /
GS40caraka_u:610: cikitsā yair aviditair na yathāvat pravartate // Car_1,26.35
GS40caraka_u:612: samprati pūrvoktagurvādiguṇātiriktān paratvāparatvādīn daśa guṇān rasadharmatvenopadeṣṭavyānāha paretyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:615_0: tatra deśo maruḥ paraḥ anūpo 'paraḥ kālo visargaḥ paraḥ ādānamaparaḥ vayastaruṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:615_1: param aparam itaran mānaṃ ca śarīrasya yathā vakṣyamāṇaṃ śarīre paraṃ tato'nyadaparaṃ
GS40caraka_u:615_2: pākavīryarasāstu ye yasya yoginaste taṃ prati parāḥ ayaugikās tv aparāḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:617_0: kiṃvā paratvāparatve vaiśeṣikokte jñeye tatra deśāpekṣayā saṃnikṛṣṭadeśasambandhinam
GS40caraka_u:617_1: apekṣya vidūradeśasambandhini paratvaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭadeśasambandhini cāparatvaṃ bhavati
GS40caraka_u:617_2: evaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭakālāpekṣayā ca sthavire paratvaṃ yūni cāparatvaṃ bhavati // 6
GS40caraka_u:618: vayaḥprabhṛtiṣu paratvāparatvaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ kāladeśakṛtam evehopayogād upacaritam apyabhihitaṃ yato na guṇe mānādau guṇāntarasambhavaḥ // 7
GS40caraka_u:619_0: yuktiścetyādau yojanā doṣādyapekṣayā bheṣajasya samīcīnakalpanā ata evoktaṃ yā tu
GS40caraka_u:619_1: yujyate yā kalpanā yaugikī bhavati sā tu yuktir ucyate ayaugikī tu kalpanāpi satī
GS40caraka_u:624: saheti militānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ yogaḥ prāptirityarthaḥ sahetyanenehākiṃcitkaraṃ parasparasaṃyogaṃ nirākaroti // 13
GS40caraka_u:626: tatra dvaṃdvakarmajo yathā yudhyamānayor meṣayoḥ sarvakarmajo yathā bhāṇḍe prakṣipyamāṇānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ bahulamāṣakriyā yogajaḥ ekakarmajo yathā vṛkṣavāyasayoḥ // 15
GS40caraka_u:630: vibhaktimeva vivṛṇoti viyoga iti saṃyogasya vigamo viyogaḥ // 19
GS40caraka_u:631: tat kiṃ saṃyogābhāva eva viyoga ityāha bhāgaśo graha iti // 20
GS40caraka_u:632: vibhāgaśo vibhaktatvena grahaṇaṃ yato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ tena vibhaktirityeṣā bhāvarūpā pratītir na saṃyogābhāvamātraṃ bhavati kiṃtarhi bhāvarūpavibhāgaguṇayuktā ityarthaḥ // 21
GS40caraka_u:633: pṛthaktvaṃ tu idaṃ dravyaṃ paṭalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭāt pṛthag ityādikā buddhiryato bhavati tat pṛthaktvaṃ bhavati // 22
GS40caraka_u:635: tatra yat sarvathāsaṃyujyamānayoriva meruhimācalayoḥ pṛthaktvam etadasaṃyoga ityanenoktam // 24
GS40caraka_u:636: tathā saṃyujyamānānāmapi pṛthaktvaṃ vijātīyānāṃ mahiṣavarāhādīnāṃ tadāha vailakṣaṇyamityādi // 25
GS40caraka_u:638: tathaikajātīyānāmapy avilakṣaṇānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ pṛthaktvaṃ bhavatītyāha anekateti // 27
GS40caraka_u:639: ekajātīyeṣu hi saṃyukteṣu na vailakṣaṇyaṃ nāpyasaṃyogaḥ atha cānekatā pṛthaktvarūpā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 28
GS40caraka_u:640: kiṃvā pṛthaktvaṃ guṇāntaramicchan lokavyavahārārtham asaṃyogavailakṣaṇyānekatārūpameva yathodāhṛtaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ darśayati // 29
GS40caraka_u:642: karaṇaṃ guṇāntarādhāyakatvaṃ saṃskaraṇamityarthaḥ yadvakṣyati saṃskāro hi guṇāntarādhānamucyate iti // 30
GS40caraka_u:644: abhyasanameva lokaprasiddhābhyāṃ paryāyābhyāṃ vivṛṇoti śīlanaṃ satatakriyeti yaṃ lokāḥ śīlanasatatakriyābhyām abhidadhati so 'bhyāsa iti bhāvaḥ // 32
GS40caraka_u:645: ayaṃ ca saṃyogasaṃskāraviśeṣarūpo 'pi viśeṣeṇa cikitsopayuktatvāt pṛthagucyate // 33
GS40caraka_u:646: na yathāvat pravartata iti vacanena śabdādiṣu ca gurvādiṣu ca parādīnāmaprādhānyaṃ sūcayati // 34]
GS40caraka_u:650: samprati rasānāṃ parasparasaṃyogo guṇa uktaḥ tathāgre ca snigdhatvādirguṇo vācyaḥ sa ca guṇarūparase na sambhavatīti yathā rasānāṃ guṇanirdeśo boddhavyas tadāha guṇā ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:651: guṇā guṇāśrayā noktā iti dīrghaṃjīvitīye samavāyī tu niśceṣṭaḥ kāraṇaṃ guṇaḥ ityanena // 2
GS40caraka_u:652: rasaguṇāniti rase snigdhādīn guṇān nirdiṣṭān tad rasādhāradravyaguṇān eva vidyāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:653: nanu yadi dravyaguṇā eva te tat kimiti rasaguṇatvenocyanta ityāha karturityādi karturiti tantrakartuḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:654_0: abhiprāyā iti tatra tatropacāreṇa tathā sāmānyaśabdādiprayogeṇa tantrakaraṇabuddhayaḥ
GS40caraka_u:654_1: sāmānyaśabdopacārādiprayogaś ca prakaraṇādivaśād eva sphuṭatvāt tathā prayojanavaśāc ca kriyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:655: tacca prakaraṇādi ataśca prakṛtaṃ buddhvā ityādau darśayiṣyāmaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:656_0: iha ca dravyaguṇānāṃ raseṣu yadupacaraṇaṃ tasyāyamabhiprāyo yat madhurādinirdeśenaiva
GS40caraka_u:656_1: snigdhaśītādiguṇā api prāyo madhurādyavyabhicāriṇo dravye nirdiṣṭā bhavantīti na
GS40caraka_u:656_2: madhuratvaṃ nirdiśya snigdhatvādipratipādanaṃ punaḥ pṛthak kriyata iti // 7]
GS40caraka_u:660: abhiprāyapṛthaktve sati yathā grantho boddhavyas tadāha ataś cetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:661: tatra prakṛtaṃ buddhvā yathā kṣārāḥ kṣīraṃ phalaṃ puṣpam ityatrodbhidagaṇasya prakṛtatvāt kṣīramiti snuhyādikṣīram eva kṣīraśabdena vadet // 2
GS40caraka_u:662: deśāntaraṃ buddhveti yathā śirasi śodhane 'bhidhīyamāne krimivyādhau iti tacchirogatakrimivyādhāv eva bhavati // 3
GS40caraka_u:663: kālāntare yathā vamanakāle 'bhihitaṃ pratigrahāṃś copahārayed iti tatra pratigrahaśabdena pātramucyate na tu grahaṇaṃ pratigrahaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:664: tantrakartur abhiprāyān iti yathoktaṃ raseṣu guṇāropaṇe tad boddhavyam // 5
GS40caraka_u:667: yadyapi prakṛtādayo 'pi tantrakartur abhiprāyā eva tathāpi yatra prakṛtatvādi na sphuṭaṃ pratīyate tatra tantrakartur abhiprāyatvena boddhavyam // 8]
GS40caraka_u:669: ṣaṭ pañcabhūtaprabhavāḥ saṃkhyātāśca yathā rasāḥ // Car_1,26.38
GS40caraka_u:672: ṣaṭ pañcabhūtaprabhavā iti pañcabhūtaprabhavāḥ santo yathoktena prakāreṇa somaguṇātirekāt ityādinā yathā ṣaṭ saṃkhyātāḥ ṣaṭsaṃkhyāparicchinnā bhavanti tathā vakṣyāmīti yojanā // 2]
GS40caraka_u:673_0: saumyāḥ khalvāpo'ntarikṣaprabhavāḥ prakṛtiśītā laghvyaś cāvyaktarasāśca tāstvantarikṣādbhraśyamānā
GS40caraka_u:673_1: bhraṣṭāśca pañcamahāguṇasamanvitā jaṅgamasthāvarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrtīr abhiprīṇayanti
GS40caraka_u:673_2: tāsu mūrtiṣu ṣaḍ abhimūrchanti rasāḥ // Car_1,26.39
GS40caraka_u:675: samprati rasānām ādikāraṇameva tāvad āha saumyā ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:677: bhraśyamānā iti vadatā bhūmisambandhavyatirekeṇāntarīkṣeritaiḥ pṛthivyādiparamāṇvādibhiḥ sambandho rasārambhako bhavatīti darśyate // 3
GS40caraka_u:681: atra cāntarīkṣamudakaṃ rasakāraṇatve pradhānatvāduktaṃ tena kṣitistham api sthāvarajaṅgamotpattau rasakāraṇaṃ bhavatyeva // 7]
GS40caraka_u:682_0: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ somaguṇātirekānmadhuro rasaḥ pṛthivyagnibhūyiṣṭhatvādamlaḥ salilāgnibhūyiṣṭhatvāl
GS40caraka_u:682_1: lavaṇaḥ vāyvagnibhūyiṣṭhatvātkaṭukaḥ vāyvākāśātiriktatvāt tiktaḥ pavanapṛthivīvyatirekāt kaṣāya iti /
GS40caraka_u:683_0: evameṣāṃ rasānāṃ ṣaṭtvam upapannaṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣān mahābhūtānāṃ bhūtānāmiva sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ
GS40caraka_u:683_1: nānāvarṇākṛtiviśeṣāḥ ṣaḍṛtukatvācca kālasyopapanno mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣaḥ // Car_1,26.40
GS40caraka_u:685_0: somaguṇātirekāditi atirekaśabdena sarveṣveva raseṣu sarvabhūtasāṃnidhyam asti kvacit
GS40caraka_u:685_1: tu kasyacid bhūtaguṇasyātirekād rasaviśeṣe bhavatīti darśayati etacca madhuraṃ prati
GS40caraka_u:685_2: abguṇātiriktatvaṃ viśeṣotpattau kāraṇatvena jñeyaṃ yaccādhārakāraṇatvam apāṃ tat
GS40caraka_u:687: lavaṇastu suśrute pṛthivyagnyatirekāt paṭhitaḥ asmiṃś ca virodhe kāryavirodho nāstyeva // 3
GS40caraka_u:688_0: nanu uṣṇaśītābhyāmagnisalilābhyāṃ kṛtasya lavaṇasyāpy uṣṇaśītatvena bhavitavyaṃ tal
GS40caraka_u:688_1: lavaṇaṃ katham uṣṇaṃ bhavati naivaṃ yato bhūtānām ayaṃ svabhāvo yat kenacit prakāreṇa
GS40caraka_u:688_2: saṃniviṣṭāḥ kaṃcid guṇam ārabhante na sarvam // 4
GS40caraka_u:689: yathā makuṣṭhake 'dbhir madhuro rasaḥ kriyate na snehaḥ tathā saindhave vahnināpi noṣṇatvam ārabhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:690: ayaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ saṃniveśo 'dṛṣṭaprabhāvakṛta eva sa ca saṃniveśaḥ kāryadarśanenonneyaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:691: tena yatra kāryaṃ dṛśyate tatra kalpyate yathā lavaṇe uṣṇatvād agnir viṣyanditvācca jalamanumīyate // 7
GS40caraka_u:693_0: etena yaducyate toyavat pṛthivyādayo'pi kimiti pṛthagrasāntaraṃ na kurvanti tathā
GS40caraka_u:693_1: toyavātādisaṃyogādibhyaḥ kimiti rasāntarāṇi notpadyanta iti tadapi bhūtasvabhāvāparyanuyogād eva pratyuktam // 9
GS40caraka_u:694: iha ca kāraṇatvaṃ bhūtānāṃ rasasya madhuratvādiviśeṣa eva nimittakāraṇarūpam ucyate tena nīrasānām api hi dahanādīnāṃ kāraṇatvamupapannam eva vyutpāditam // 10
GS40caraka_u:696: rasānāṃ ṣaṭtvaṃ mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣāt somaguṇātirekapṛthivyagnyatirekādeḥ ṣaḍutpādakāraṇādupapannaṃ ṣaḍbhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ ṣaṭ kāryāṇi bhavantīti yuktameveti bhāvaḥ // 12
GS40caraka_u:697: bhūtānāṃ yathā nānāvarṇākṛtiviśeṣā mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣāt tathā rasānām apīti // 13
GS40caraka_u:698: bhūtānāṃ yathoktānām atirekaviśeṣahetum āha ṣaḍṛtukatvād ityādi // 14
GS40caraka_u:699_0: ṣaḍṛtukatvena kālo nānāhemantādirūpatayā kaṃcidbhūtaviśeṣaṃ kvacidvardhayati sa cātmakāryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:699_1: rasaṃ puṣṭaṃ karoti yathā hemantakāle somaguṇātireko bhavati śiśire vāyvākāśātirekaḥ
GS40caraka_u:699_2: evaṃ tasyāśitīyoktarasotpādakrameṇa vasantādāv api bhūtotkarṣo jñeyaḥ ṣaḍṛtukācceti
GS40caraka_u:699_3: cakāreṇāhorātrakṛto 'pi bhūtotkarṣo jñeyaḥ tathādṛṣṭakṛtaś ca tena hemantādāv api
GS40caraka_u:700_0: yadyapi ca ṛtubhede'pi bhūtotkarṣaviśeṣa eva kāraṇaṃ yaduktaṃ tāv etāv arkavāyū ityādi
GS40caraka_u:700_1: tathāpi bījāṅkurakāryakāraṇabhāvavat saṃsārānāditayaiva bhūtaviśeṣartvoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vācyaḥ // 16]
GS40caraka_u:701_0: tatrāgnimārutātmakā rasāḥ prāyeṇordhvabhājaḥ lāghavādutplavanatvāc ca vāyorūrdhvajvalanatvācca
GS40caraka_u:701_1: vahneḥ salilapṛthivyātmakāstu prāyeṇādhobhājaḥ pṛthivyā gurutvān nimnagatvāc codakasya
GS40caraka_u:706: plavanatvāditi gatimattvāt yadyapi gatiradho'pi syāt tathāpi laghutvaparigatagatir iha vāyorūrdhvam eva gamanaṃ karoti yathā śālmalītulānām // 4
GS40caraka_u:707: hetvantaram āha ūrdhvajvalanatvāc cāgneriti agner apyūrdhvagatitvād ityarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:709: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāmekaikasya yathādravyaṃ guṇakarmāṇyanuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ // Car_1,26.42
GS40caraka_u:711: yathādravyamiti yadyasya rasasya dravyam ādhāras tadanatikrameṇa // 1
GS40caraka_u:712: etena rasānāṃ guṇakarmaṇī rasādhāre dravye boddhavye iti darśayati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:713_2: tvacyaḥ keśyaḥ kaṇṭhyo balyaḥ prīṇano jīvanastarpaṇo bṛṃhaṇaḥ sthairyakaraḥ kṣīṇakṣatasaṃdhānakaro
GS40caraka_u:716: madhura ādāv ucyate praśastāyuṣyādiguṇatayā prāyaḥ prāṇipriyatayā ca // 2
GS40caraka_u:720: kṣīṇasya saṃdhānakaro dhātupoṣakatvena kiṃvā kṣīṇaścāsau kṣataśceti tena kṣīṇakṣatasya uraḥkṣataṃ saṃdadhāti // 6
GS40caraka_u:722: yaduktaṃ mūtre 'bhidhāvanti pipīlikāśca iti tathā riṣṭe vakṣyati yasmin gṛdhnanti makṣikāḥ iti anena ca madhuratvaṃ jñāyate // 8
GS40caraka_u:723: akṣyāmayenaivābhiṣyande labdhe viśeṣopādānārthaṃ punarvacanaṃ kiṃvā abhiṣyando nāsādiṣvapi jñeyaḥ // 9]
GS40caraka_u:724_0: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamānaḥ sthaulyaṃ mārdavam ālasyam atisvapnaṃ
GS40caraka_u:724_2: ityevaṃprabhṛtīn kaphajān vikārānupajanayati amlo raso bhaktaṃ rocayati agniṃ dīpayati
GS40caraka_u:724_3: dehaṃ bṛṃhayati ūrjayati mano bodhayati indriyāṇi dṛḍhīkaroti balaṃ vardhayati vātamanulomayati
GS40caraka_u:724_4: hṛdayaṃ tarpayati āsyamāsrāvayati bhuktamapakarṣayati kledayati jarayati prīṇayati
GS40caraka_u:727: bhuktam apakarṣayatīti sārayati kledayati tathā jarayati bhuktameva // 2
GS40caraka_u:728: avamūtritaṃ mūtraviṣairjantubhiḥ parisarpitaṃ ca sparśaviśeṣaiḥ kāraṇḍādibhiḥ // 3]
GS40caraka_u:729_0: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno dantān harṣayati tarṣayati saṃmīlayatyakṣiṇī
GS40caraka_u:729_1: saṃvejayati lomāni kaphaṃ vilāpayati pittamabhivardhayati raktaṃ dūṣayati māṃsaṃ
GS40caraka_u:729_2: vidahati kāyaṃ śithilīkaroti kṣīṇakṣatakṛśadurbalānāṃ śvayathum āpādayati api ca
GS40caraka_u:729_4: pācayatyāgneyasvabhāvāt paridahati kaṇṭhamuro hṛdayaṃ ca lavaṇo rasaḥ pācanaḥ kledano
GS40caraka_u:729_5: dīpanaścyāvanaśchedano bhedanas tīkṣṇaḥ saro vikāsy adhaḥsraṃsy avakāśakaro vātaharaḥ
GS40caraka_u:729_7: viṣyandayati mārgān viśodhayati sarvaśarīrāvayavān mṛdūkaroti rocayatyāhāram āhārayogī
GS40caraka_u:733: sarvarasapratyanīkabhūta iti yatra mātrātirikto lavaṇo bhavati tatra nānyo rasa upalakṣyate // 3
GS40caraka_u:737_0: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyartham upayujyamānaḥ pittaṃ kopayati raktaṃ vardhayati tarṣayati
GS40caraka_u:737_1: mūrchayati tāpayati dārayati kuṣṇāti māṃsāni pragālayati kuṣṭhāni viṣaṃ vardhayati
GS40caraka_u:737_2: śophān sphoṭayati dantāṃścyāvayati puṃstvamupahanti indriyāṇyuparuṇaddhi valipalitakhālityamāpādayati
GS40caraka_u:737_4: kaṭuko raso vaktraṃ śodhayati agniṃ dīpayati bhuktaṃ śoṣayati ghrāṇamāsrāvayati cakṣurvirecayati
GS40caraka_u:737_6: rocayatyaśanaṃ kaṇḍūrvināśayati vraṇān avasādayati krimīn hinasti māṃsaṃ vilikhati
GS40caraka_u:737_7: śoṇitasaṃghātaṃ bhinatti bandhāṃśchinatti mārgān vivṛṇoti śleṣmāṇaṃ śamayati laghuruṣṇo rūkṣaśca /
GS40caraka_u:738_0: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno vipākaprabhāvāt puṃstvamupahanti rasavīryaprabhāvānmohayanti
GS40caraka_u:738_1: glāpayati sādayati karśayati mūrchayati namayati tamayati bhramayati kaṇṭhaṃ paridahati
GS40caraka_u:738_2: śarīratāpamupajanayati balaṃ kṣiṇoti tṛṣṇāṃ janayati api ca vāyvagniguṇabāhulyād
GS40caraka_u:738_4: upajanayati tikto rasaḥ svayamarociṣṇur apyarocakaghno viṣaghnaḥ krimighno mūrchādāhakaṇḍūkuṣṭhatṛṣṇāpraśamanas
GS40caraka_u:738_5: tvaṅmāṃsayoḥ sthirīkaraṇo jvaraghno dīpanaḥ pācanaḥ stanyaśodhano lekhanaḥ kledamedovasāmajjalasīkāpūyasvedamūtrapurīṣapittaśleṣmopaśoṣaṇo
GS40caraka_u:739_0: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno raukṣyāt kharaviṣadasvabhāvāc ca rasarudhiramāṃsamedo'sthimajjaśukrāṇy
GS40caraka_u:739_1: ucchoṣayati srotasāṃ kharatvamupapādayati balam ādatte karśayati glapayati mohayati
GS40caraka_u:739_2: bhramayati vadanam upaśoṣayati aparāṃśca vātavikārānupajanayati kaṣāyo rasaḥ saṃśamanaḥ
GS40caraka_u:739_3: saṃgrāhī saṃdhānakaraḥ pīḍano ropaṇaḥ śoṣaṇaḥ stambhanaḥ śleṣmaraktapittapraśamanaḥ
GS40caraka_u:740_0: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāna āsyaṃ śoṣayati hṛdayaṃ pīḍayati udaram
GS40caraka_u:740_1: ādhmāpayati vācaṃ nigṛhṇāti srotāṃsy avabadhnāti śyāvatvamāpādayati puṃstvamupahanti
GS40caraka_u:740_2: viṣṭabhya jarāṃ gacchati vātamūtrapurīṣaretāṃsyavagṛhṇāti karśayati glapayati tarṣayati
GS40caraka_u:742: vipākasya prabhāvo vipākaprabhāvaḥ vipākaśca kaṭūnāṃ kaṭureva rasasya vīryasya ca prabhāvo rasavīryaprabhāvaḥ ayaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇe sarvatra hetuḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:744: atra ca vipākaprabhāvādikathanam udāharaṇārthaṃ tena madhurādiṣu vipākādikāryam unneyam // 3
GS40caraka_u:750_0: ityevamete ṣaḍrasāḥ pṛthaktvenaikatvena vā mātraśaḥ samyagupayujyamānā upakārāya
GS40caraka_u:750_1: bhavantyadhyātmalokasya apakārakarāḥ punarato'nyathā bhavantyupayujyamānāḥ tān vidvānupakārārthameva
GS40caraka_u:758: śītaṃ vīryeṇa yad dravyaṃ madhuraṃ rasapākayoḥ /
GS40caraka_u:759: tayoramlaṃ yaduṣṇaṃ ca yaddravyaṃ kaṭukaṃ tayoḥ // Car_1,26.45
GS40caraka_u:761: samprati rasadvāreṇaiva dravyāṇāṃ vīryam āha śītamityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:762_0: yaddravyaṃ rase pāke ca madhuraṃ tacchītaṃ vīryeṇa jñeyaṃ tathā tayoriti rasapākayor
GS40caraka_u:762_1: yadamlaṃ dravyaṃ taduṣṇaṃ vīryeṇa tathā yacca dravyaṃ tayoriti rasapākayoḥ kaṭukam
GS40caraka_u:762_2: uktaṃ taccoṣṇaṃ vīryeṇa bhavati iti śeṣaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:763: kiṃvā yaccoṣṇaṃ kaṭukaṃ tayoḥ iti pāṭhaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:764_0: tatra yadrasato madhuraṃ tad vīryataḥ śītamiti vaktavye yad rasapākayor iti karoti
GS40caraka_u:764_1: tan madhurarasocitapākasyaiva madhuradravyasya śītavīryatāprāptyartham evam amlakaṭukayor api vācyam // 4]
GS40caraka_u:767: yathā payo yathā sarpir yathā vā cavyacitrakau /
GS40caraka_u:770: teṣām iti madhurapākādīnāṃ rasopadeśeneti rasamātrakathanenaiva yato vipāko 'pi rasata eva prāyo jñāyate yad vakṣyati kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ vipākaḥ prāyaśaḥ kaṭur ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:772_0: vīryato'viparītānāṃ rasadvārā vīryajñānaṃ na tu rasaviruddhavīryāṇāṃ mahāpañcamūlādīnāṃ
GS40caraka_u:772_1: na kevalaṃ rasena kiṃ tarhi pākataśca ya upadekṣyate guṇasaṃgrahaḥ śukrahā baddhaviṇmūtro
GS40caraka_u:772_2: vipāko vātalaḥ kaṭuḥ ityādinā sa ca vīryato 'viruddhānāṃ vijñeyaḥ yadi tatra vīryaṃ
GS40caraka_u:772_3: virodhi bhavati tadā vipāko'pi yathoktaguṇakarī na syāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:773: kiṃvā pākataścāviparītānāṃ rasopadeśena guṇasaṃgrahaḥ śītoṣṇalakṣaṇo nirdeśyaḥ yasyāstu pippalyāḥ kaṭukāyā api viparītamadhurapākitvaṃ na tatra kaṭu rasatvenoṣṇatvam ityarthaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:774: asmiṃśca pakṣe upadekṣyate iti yathā payaḥ ityādinā sambadhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:778_0: samprati madhuratiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ śītatvaṃ tathā kaṭvamlalavaṇānāṃ coṣṇatvaṃ tathā kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ
GS40caraka_u:778_1: cāvṛṣyatvamityādayo rasadvāreṇa dravyāṇāṃ ye guṇā uktāstadapavādam āha teṣāmityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:779_0: rasopadeśena rasaguṇakathanadvāreṇa dravyāṇāṃ yaḥ śītoṣṇādiguṇasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ sa
GS40caraka_u:779_1: vīryataḥ pākataścāviparītānāṃ teṣāṃ vakṣyamāṇakṣīrādidravyāṇāmeva nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:781: upadekṣyata iti yathā paya ityādibhiḥ sambadhyate // 4
GS40caraka_u:782: etāni hi dravyaguṇakathanaprasaṅge rasāviparītavīryavipākatayaivopadeṣṭavyānīti rasānurūpaguṇatvam eṣāṃ jñātavyam ityarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:783: idaṃ tūdāharaṇaikadeśamātraṃ tenāparāṇy apyevaṃjātīyāny udāhartavyānītyāha evamādīnītyādi // 6
GS40caraka_u:785: madhuraṃ kiṃciduṣṇaṃ syāt kaṣāyaṃ tiktameva ca /
GS40caraka_u:790: samprati yatra viruddhavīryatvena rasenoṣṇatvādi na nirdeśyaṃ tad āha madhuram ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:791: kiṃcit kaṣāyaṃ coṣṇaṃ tiktaṃ coṣṇam iti yojanā kaṣāyatiktalavaṇānām udāharaṇam asūtritānām api prakaraṇāt kṛtam // 2
GS40caraka_u:793: etacca tiktasya kaṣāyasya coṣṇatāyām udāharaṇam abjānūpāmiṣaṃ tu madhurasyoṣṇavīryatve // 4]
GS40caraka_u:794: kiṃcidamlaṃ hi saṃgrāhi kiṃcidamlaṃ bhinatti ca /
GS40caraka_u:795: yathā kapitthaṃ saṃgrāhi bhedi cāmalakaṃ tathā // Car_1,26.50
GS40caraka_u:797: kaṣāyaḥ stambhanaḥ śītaḥ so 'bhayāyām ato'nyathā // Car_1,26.51
GS40caraka_u:799: dṛṣṭaṃ tulyarase'pyevaṃ dravye dravye guṇāntaram // Car_1,26.52

GS40caraka_u:967: dehadhātupratyanīkabhūtānīti dehadhātūnāṃ rasādīnāṃ vātādīnāṃ ca prakṛtisthānāṃ pratyanīkasvarūpāṇi // 1

GS40caraka_u:971: saṃyogaviruddhaṃ yathā tadeva nikucaṃ pakvaṃ na māṣa ityādinoktaṃ yat saṃskārādiviruddhaguṇakathanaṃ vinā sāhityamātreṇa viruddham ucyate tat saṃyogaviruddham // 5
GS40caraka_u:972: matsyapayasos tu yadyapi sahopayogo viruddhatvenoktaḥ tathāpyasau guṇaviruddhatvena kathita iti guṇavirodhakasyaivodāharaṇam /

GS40caraka_u:987: sa punaḥ śakalī ityādinā nāndiniḥ iti khyāto matsya ucyate // 4]

GS40caraka_u:989: grāmyānūpaudakapiśitāni ca madhutilaguḍapayomāṣamūlakabisair virūḍhadhānyairvā naikadhyamadyāt tanmūlaṃ hi bādhiryāndhyavepathujāḍyakalamūkatāmaiṇmiṇyam athavā maraṇamāpnoti /
GS40caraka_u:990_0: na pauṣkaraṃ rohiṇīkaṃ śākaṃ kapotān vā sarṣapatailabhraṣṭān madhupayobhyāṃ sahābhyavaharet
GS40caraka_u:992: na jātukaśākaṃ na nikucaṃ pakvaṃ madhupayobhyāṃ sahopayojyam etaddhi maraṇāyāthavā balavarṇatejovīryoparodhāyālaghuvyādhaye ṣāṇḍhyāya ceti /
GS40caraka_u:993: tadeva nikucaṃ pakvaṃ na māṣasūpaguḍasarpirbhiḥ sahopayojyaṃ vairodhikatvāt /
GS40caraka_u:994_1: cānyāni dravyāṇi sarvaṃ cāmlaṃ dravamadravaṃ ca payasā saha viruddham /
GS40caraka_u:996: padmottarikāśākaṃ śārkaro maireyo madhu ca sahopayuktaṃ viruddhaṃ vātaṃ cātikopayati /
GS40caraka_u:1000: balākā vāruṇyā saha kulmāṣairapi viruddhā saiva śūkaravasāparibhṛṣṭā sadyo vyāpādayati /
GS40caraka_u:1001: mayūramāṃsam eraṇḍasīsakāvasaktam eraṇḍāgnipluṣṭam eraṇḍatailayuktaṃ sadyo vyāpādayati /
GS40caraka_u:1002: hāridrakamāṃsaṃ hāridrasīsakāvasaktaṃ hāridrāgnipluṣṭaṃ sadyo vyāpādayati tadeva bhasmapāṃśuparidhvastaṃ sakṣaudraṃ sadyo maraṇāya /
GS40caraka_u:1003: matsyanistālanasiddhāḥ pippalyastathā kākamācī madhu ca maraṇāya /
GS40caraka_u:1004: madhu coṣṇam uṣṇārtasya ca madhu maraṇāya /
GS40caraka_u:1005_0: madhusarpiṣī samadhṛte cāntarikṣaṃ samadhṛtaṃ madhu puṣkarabījaṃ madhu pītvoṣṇodakaṃ
GS40caraka_u:1005_1: bhallātakoṣṇodakaṃ takrasiddhaḥ kampillakaḥ paryuṣitā kākamācī aṅgāraśūlyo bhāsaśceti viruddhāni /
GS40caraka_u:1010: pauṣkarādīnāṃ madhupayobhyāṃ sahābhyavahāro viruddhaḥ pauṣkaraṃ puṣkaratratrarūpaṃ śākaṃ rohiṇī kaṭurohiṇī // 3
GS40caraka_u:1014: tathāmletyādau amlagrahaṇena labdhānāpy amlāmrātakādīnām abhidhānaṃ viśeṣavirodhasūcanārtham // 6
GS40caraka_u:1015_1: bhavati hi prakaraṇād ekadeśe 'pi sarvavyapadeśaḥ yathā sarvān bhojayediti kiṃvā
GS40caraka_u:1016_0: payaseti tṛtīyayeva sahārthe labdhe punaḥ sahetyabhidhānaṃ kevalāmlādiyuktasyaiva
GS40caraka_u:1016_1: virodhitopadarśanārthaṃ tena amlapayaḥsaṃyoge guḍādisaṃyoge sati viruddhatvaṃ na dugdhāmrādīnām // 8
GS40caraka_u:1020: vātaṃ cātikopayatīti vacanena pittakaphāv alpaṃ kopayatīti bodhayati evaṃ pittaṃ cātikopayati kaphaṃ cātikopayatītyetayorapi vācyam // 12

GS40caraka_u:1025: matsyā nistālyante pacyante yasmin tanmatsyanistālanaṃ kiṃvā nistālanaṃ vasā jatūkarṇe'pyuktaṃ matsyavasā siddhāḥ pippalyaḥ iti // 17
GS40caraka_u:1028: yat kiṃcid doṣamāsrāvya na nirharati kāyataḥ /

GS40caraka_u:1078: etacca vairodhikakathanaṃ viśeṣavacanena bādhyate tena laśunasya kṣīreṇa pānaṃ kvacin na virodhi yaduktaṃ sādhayecchuddhaśuṣkasya laśunasya catuṣpalam // 3
GS40caraka_u:1079: kṣīrodake'ṣṭaguṇite kṣīraśeṣaṃ ca pāyayet tathā mūlakasvarasaṃ kṣīram ityādiprayogeṣūnneyam // 4

GS40caraka_u:1109: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte ślokasthāne ātreyabhadrakāpyīyo nāma ṣaḍviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ // Car_1,26.114
GS40caraka_u:1111: saṃgrahe dravyasaṃkhyā rasāśrayā iti bhedaścaiṣām ityādinā rasasaṃkhyā hi paramārthato dravyasaṃkhyaiva nirguṇatvād rasānām iti bhāvaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:1112: kāraṇaṃ rasasaṃkhyāyā iti rasānāṃ tatra yogyatvād ityādinā vibhaktayo bhedaḥ tatra madhura ityādinā // 2
GS40caraka_u:1113: uddeśo dravyāṇāṃ śītaṃ vīryeṇa ityādinā apavādo dravyāṇāṃ madhuraṃ kiṃcit ityādinā // 3]
GS40caraka_u:1119: samprati sāmānyenoktānāṃ guṇakarmabhyāṃ prativyaktyanuktānāṃ prativyaktiprāya upayogidravyasya viśiṣṭaguṇakarmakathanārtham annapānavidhir adhyāyo'bhidhīyate // 1

GS40caraka_u:1127: vidhir vakṣyamāṇarasavimāne tadetadāhāravidhānam ityādigranthavācyaḥ tathendriyopakramaṇīye nāratnapāṇiḥ ityādinoktaṃ vidhānaṃ tena vidhinā vihitaṃ vidhivihitam // 3

GS40caraka_u:1131_1: vṛkṣādayo hi vanaspatisattvānukāropadeśācchastre prāṇina uktāḥ na tu loke prāṇisaṃjñakāḥ
