GS40caraka_u:2290_3: sa vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyo 'bhidhīyate vikṛtyā hetubhūtayā viṣamaḥ prakṛtyananuguṇaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2292_0: ye tu vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyau pṛthag eva kurvanti viṣamasamavāyasya vaiṣamyatāratamyenātibahuprapañcitatvād
GS40caraka_u:2292_1: viṣamāvayavaguṇānumānaṃ duḥśakam iti kṛtvā tadapi dravyavikāraprabhāveṇaiva vyapadiśanti // 22]
GS40caraka_u:2293: tathāyukte hi samudaye samudāyaprabhāvatattvamevam evopalabhya tato dravyavikāraprabhāvatattvaṃ vyavasyet // Car_3,1.11
GS40caraka_u:2295: atha kathaṃ tarhi vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyaprabhāvajñānam ityāha tathāyukte hītyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2298_0: samadhṛte hi madhusarpiṣi sūryāvartākhye vā doṣasamudaye na saṃyujyamānamadhughṛtaguṇakramāgataṃ
GS40caraka_u:2298_1: mārakatvaṃ na ca vātādidoṣaprabhāvagataṃ sūryavṛddhyā vardhiṣṇutvaṃ sūryāvartasya
GS40caraka_u:2299: yacca gatidvayaṃ doṣarasamelakasya tena prakṛtisamasamavāyarūpaṃ saṃnipātaṃ jvaranidāne doṣaliṅgamelakenaivoktavān // 5
GS40caraka_u:2300: yaduktaṃ pṛthaguktalakṣaṇasaṃsargād dvāṃdvikam anyatamaṃ sāṃnipātikaṃ vā jvaraṃ vidyād iti // 6
GS40caraka_u:2301: yastu vikṛtiviṣamasamavetastridoṣakṛto jvaras tasya cikitsite kṣaṇe dāhaḥ kṣaṇe śītam ityādinā lakṣaṇam uktam // 7
GS40caraka_u:2302: na hi śyāvaraktakoṭhotpattyādi tatroktaṃ vātādijvare kvacid asti // 8
GS40caraka_u:2303: evaṃ rase'pi yatrāmrāte madhuratvaṃ prakṛtisamasamavetaṃ tatrāmrātaṃ madhuram etanmātram evoktaṃ tena madhurasāmānyaguṇāgataṃ tasya vātapittaharatvamapi labhyata eva // 9
GS40caraka_u:2304: yatra vārtāke kaṭutiktatvena vātakaratvaṃ prāptamapi ca vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyāttanna bhavati tatrācāryeṇa vārtākaṃ vātaghnam ityuktam eva // 10
GS40caraka_u:2306: yattu prakṛtisamasamavāyakṛtarasadoṣaguṇadvārā prāptamapi dravyaguṇaṃ vikāralakṣaṇaṃ ca brūte tat prakarṣārthaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ ceti jñeyam // 12]
GS40caraka_u:2307: tasmād rasaprabhāvataś ca dravyaprabhāvataś ca doṣaprabhāvataś ca vikāraprabhāvataś ca tattvamupadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_3,1.12
GS40caraka_u:2311_0: yattu pūrvaṃ tatrādau rasadravyadoṣavikāraprabhāvān upadekṣyāmaḥ ityanena rasādiprabhāvavyākhyānapratijñānaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2311_1: kṛtaṃ tattu rasaprabhāvānumānenaiva dravyaprabhāvakathanāt tathā doṣaprabhāveṇa ca
GS40caraka_u:2312_0: iha tu vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyātmake dravye vikāre vā rasadoṣaprabhāvānumānena na dravyavikāraprabhāvānumānam
GS40caraka_u:2312_1: astīti kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthagrasādiprabhāvatattvābhidhānapratijñānam iti na paunaruktyam // 4
GS40caraka_u:2313: iha dravyāṇāṃ vīryaprabhāvavipākaprabhāvau ca dravyaprabhāve rasaprabhāve vāntarbhāvanīyau // 5
GS40caraka_u:2314: tatra yau rasānuguṇau vīryavipākaprabhāvau tau rase yau tu rasakramoktavīryavipākaviparītau vīryavipākau tau dravyaprabhāve boddhavyau // 6
GS40caraka_u:2315: upadekṣyāma iti nikhilena tantreṇa rasādiprabhāvatattvaṃ pṛthag upadekṣyāma ityarthaḥ rasādiprabhāvaḥ prapañcena nikhile tantra eva vaktavyaḥ // 7]
GS40caraka_u:2321: eṣa iti rasāḥ ṣaḍ ityādinā tattvamupadekṣyāmaḥ ityantena granthenokta ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2323: anye tu tatraiṣa rasaprabhāva uddiṣṭo bhavati iti paṭhanti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2324_0: asmin pakṣe dravyadoṣavikāraprabhāvo 'pi 'tra uddiṣṭaḥ so 'pi rasadvārā tena rasasyaiva
GS40caraka_u:2324_1: prapañcābhihitatvāt tasyaivābhidhānam upasaṃharati na dravyādīnāmiti jñeyam dravyaprabhāvamityādau
GS40caraka_u:2324_2: punariti sāmānyena dravyaprabhāvakathanāt punaḥ śṛṅgagrāhikayā tailādidravyaprabhāvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2326_0: tatra tailaṃ snehauṣṇyagauravopapannatvād vātaṃ jayati satatamabhyasyamānaṃ vāto
GS40caraka_u:2326_1: hi raukṣyaśaityalāghavopapanno viruddhaguṇo bhavati viruddhaguṇasaṃnipāte hi bhūyasālpam
GS40caraka_u:2326_2: avajīyate tasmāttailaṃ vātaṃ jayati satatam abhyasyamānam /
GS40caraka_u:2327: sarpiḥ khalvevameva pittaṃ jayati mādhuryācchaityānmandatvācca pittaṃ hy amadhuram uṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca /
GS40caraka_u:2328: madhu ca śleṣmāṇaṃ jayati raukṣyāt taikṣṇyāt kaṣāyatvāc ca śleṣmā hi snigdho mando madhuraśca /
GS40caraka_u:2329: yac cānyadapi kiṃcid dravyamevaṃ vātapittakaphebhyo guṇato viparītaṃ syāt tac caitāñjayaty abhyasyamānam // Car_3,1.14
GS40caraka_u:2334: nanu viruddhaguṇayor madhye bhūyasālpaṃ jīyate tat kathaṃ tailaṃ vātaṃ jayati na hy asya vātaṃ prati bhūyastvaṃ yuktamityāha satatam abhyasyamānam iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2335: satatopayogena hi tailaṃ vātād adhikaṃ bhavati tena vātaṃ jayatītyarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:2336: sarpiḥ khalvevameveti sarpirapi satatam abhyasyamānam ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:2338: iha ca prabhāvaśabdena sāmānyena dravyaśaktir ucyate nācintyaśaktiḥ tena tailādīnāṃ snehauṣṇyādiguṇādapi vātādiśamanaṃ dravyaprabhāvādeva bhavati // 8
GS40caraka_u:2339: sarpiṣi ca yadyapi madhuro rasaḥ pittapraśame vyāpriyate tathāpi mādhuryaśaityamandatvaiḥ pittaśamanaṃ sarpiḥkāryameva tena dravyaprabhāva eva vācyaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:2340: yadā tu rasadvārā kāryaṃ dravyasya cintyate tadā rasaprabhāva iti vyapadeśo bhavati // 10
GS40caraka_u:2341: evaṃ kaṣāyānurase madhuni ca samādhānaṃ vācyam // 11
GS40caraka_u:2342_0: anye tu bruvate yattailādīnāṃ vātādiśamanatvaṃ pratyacintya eva prabhāvo 'yamucyate
GS40caraka_u:2342_1: tatra ca tailavātayor viruddhaguṇayor melake tailameva vātaṃ jayati na tu vātas tailam
GS40caraka_u:2342_2: iti tailasyācintyaprabhāvaḥ evaṃ sarpirmadhunor api pittaśleṣmaharaṇe prabhāvājjñeye // 12
GS40caraka_u:2343_0: etaccānye necchanti yatas tailādīnāṃ satatam abhyasyamānamiti padenādhikyameva vātādijayakāraṇamuktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2343_1: tathā yaccānyad api kiṃcid dravyam ityādigranthena dravyācintyaprabhāvaṃ parityajya
GS40caraka_u:2344: atha khalu trīṇi dravyāṇi nātyupayuñjītādhikam anyebhyo dravyebhyaḥ tadyathāpippalī kṣāraḥ lavaṇamiti // Car_3,1.15
GS40caraka_u:2347: adhikamanyebhya iti vacanādanyadapi citrakabhallātakādyevaṃjātīyaṃ nātyupayoktavyaṃ pippalyādidravyaṃ tv anyebhyo 'pyadhikam atyupayoge varjanīyamiti darśayati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2348_0: pippalyo hi kaṭukāḥ satyo madhuravipākā gurvyo nātyarthaṃ snigdhoṣṇāḥ prakledinyo
GS40caraka_u:2348_1: bheṣajābhimatāś ca tāḥ sadyaḥ śubhāśubhakāriṇyo bhavanti āpātabhadrāḥ prayogasamasādguṇyāt
GS40caraka_u:2348_2: doṣasaṃcayānubandhāḥ satatam upayujyamānā hi guruprakleditvācchleṣmāṇam utkleśayanti
GS40caraka_u:2348_3: auṣṇyāt pittaṃ na ca vātapraśamanāyopakalpante 'lpasnehoṣṇabhāvāt yogavāhinyastu
GS40caraka_u:2350_0: kaṭukāḥ satyo madhuravipākāḥ ityādi pippalīguṇakathanam anabhyāsaprayoge doṣavaiparītyena
GS40caraka_u:2353: śubhāśubhakāriṇyo bhavantīti sadyaḥ śubhakāriṇyaḥ atyabhyāsaprayoge tv aśubhakāriṇyaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:2355: prayogasamasādguṇyād iti samasya prayogasya sadguṇatvāt same 'lpakāle alpamātre ca pippalyādiprayoge sadguṇā bhavantītyarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:2358: pippalīdharmakathanaprastāvād guṇāntaram āha yogavāhinyas tv ityādi // 9
GS40caraka_u:2359: yogavāhitvena kaṭukānāmapi pippalīnāṃ vṛṣyaprayogeṣu yogaḥ tathā jvaragulmakuṣṭhaharādiprayogeṣu jvarādīn hanti pippalī // 10
GS40caraka_u:2361: tena pippalīrasāyanaprayogas tathā gulmādiṣu ca pippalīvardhamānakaprayogo na virodham āvahati // 12
GS40caraka_u:2362: ukte hi viṣaye yathoktavidhānena nirdoṣā eva pippalya iti ṛṣivacanād unnīyate /
GS40caraka_u:2363: anye tu annasaṃskaraṇe pippalyādīnām atiprayogo na tu svātantryeṇeti bruvate /
GS40caraka_u:2364: satatamupayujyamānā iti atimātratvena tathā satataprayogeṇa ceti jñeyam // 13]
GS40caraka_u:2365: kṣāraḥ punar auṣṇyataikṣṇyalāghavopapannaḥ kledayatyādau paścādviśoṣayati sa pacanadahanabhedanārtham upayujyate so 'tiprayujyamānaḥ keśākṣihṛdayapuṃstvopaghātakaraḥ saṃpadyate /
GS40caraka_u:2366_0: ye hy enaṃ grāmanagaranigamajanapadāḥ satatam upayuñjate ta āndhyaṣāṇḍhyakhālityapālityabhājo
GS40caraka_u:2366_1: hṛdayāpakartinaśca bhavanti tadyathā prācyāś cīnāśca tasmātkṣāraṃ nātyupayuñjīta // Car_3,1.17
GS40caraka_u:2369_0: lavaṇaṃ punarauṣṇyataikṣṇyopapannam anatiguru anatisnigdham upakledi visraṃsanasamartham
GS40caraka_u:2369_1: annadravyarucikaram āpātabhadraṃ prayogasamasādguṇyāt doṣasaṃcayānubandhaṃ tad rocanapācanopakledanavisraṃsanārtham upayujyate /
GS40caraka_u:2370: tad atyartham upayujyamānaṃ glāniśaithilyadaurbalyābhinirvṛttikaraṃ śarīrasya bhavati /
GS40caraka_u:2371: ye hy enad grāmanagaranigamajanapadāḥ satatamupayuñjate te bhūyiṣṭhaṃ glāsnavaḥ śithilamāṃsaśoṇitā aparikleśasahāś ca bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:2372: tadyathā vāhlīkasaurāṣṭrikasaindhavasauvīrakāḥ te hi payasāpi saha lavaṇam aśnanti /
GS40caraka_u:2373: ye 'pīha bhūmer atyūṣarā deśāsteṣvoṣadhivīrudvanaspativānaspatyā na jāyante'lpatejaso vā bhavanti lavaṇopahatatvāt /
GS40caraka_u:2375: ye hy atilavaṇasātmyāḥ puruṣāsteṣāmapi khālityapālityāni valayaścākāle bhavanti // Car_3,1.18
GS40caraka_u:2378: na kevalaṃ lavaṇātiyogaḥ śarīropaghātakaraḥ kiṃtu bhūmer apyupaghātakara ityāha ye 'pīhetyādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:2380: lavaṇaṃ nātyupayuñjīteti nātimātraṃ lavaṇaṃ satatam upayuñjīta annadravyasaṃskārakaṃ tu stokamātram abhyāsenāpyupayojanīyam eva // 4
GS40caraka_u:2381: vāhlīkādivyatirikte 'pi deśe ye 'tilavaṇam aśnanti teṣāmapi doṣānāha ye hītyādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:2382: etena cānyatrāpi deśe 'timātralavaṇasātmyānāṃ lavaṇātyupayogakṛta eva śaithilyādidoṣa unnīyate na deśasvabhāvakṛtaḥ // 6]
GS40caraka_u:2384: sātmyamapi hi krameṇopanivartyamānam adoṣam alpadoṣaṃ vā bhavati // Car_3,1.19
GS40caraka_u:2387: tatsātmyata iti atimātrakṣārād atimātralavaṇāc ca sātmyāt // 2
GS40caraka_u:2390: alpadoṣam adoṣaṃ veti pakṣadvaye 'tyarthasātmyam alpadoṣaṃ bhavati anyattvadoṣam iti vyavasthā // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2391: sātmyaṃ nāma tad yad ātmanyupaśete sātmyārtho hy upaśayārthaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2392: tattrividhaṃ pravarāvaramadhyavibhāgena saptavidhaṃ tu rasaikaikatvena sarvarasopayogācca /
GS40caraka_u:2393: tatra sarvarasaṃ pravaram avaramekarasaṃ madhyaṃ tu pravarāvaramadhyastham /
GS40caraka_u:2394: tatrāvaramadhyābhyāṃ sātmyābhyāṃ krameṇaiva pravaram upapādayet sātmyam /
GS40caraka_u:2395: sarvarasamapi ca sātmyam upapannaḥ prakṛtyādyupayoktraṣṭamāni sarvāṇyāhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanānyabhisamīkṣya hitam evānurudhyeta // Car_3,1.20
GS40caraka_u:2402: saptavidhaṃ tu ekaikarasena ṣaṭ saṃsṛṣṭarasopayogāccaikam evaṃ saptavidham // 6
GS40caraka_u:2409: upapāditasarvarasasātmyenāpi cāhāraḥ praśastaprakṛtyādisampanna eva kartavya ityāha sarvarasam ityādi // 13
GS40caraka_u:2411: hitameveti padena yadeva prakṛtyādinā hitaṃ tad evānurudhyeta sevetetyarthaḥ // 15]
GS40caraka_u:2412: tatra khalvimānyaṣṭāv āhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanāni bhavanti tadyathā prakṛtikaraṇasaṃyogarāśideśakālopayogasaṃsthopayoktraṣṭamāni bhavanti // Car_3,1.21
GS40caraka_u:2414: āhārasya vidhiḥ prakāro vidhānaṃ vā ityāhāravidhiḥ tasya viśeṣo hitatvamahitatvaṃ ca tasyāyatanāni hetūn ity āhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanāni // 1
GS40caraka_u:2417: tatra prakṛtir ucyate svabhāvo yaḥ sa punarāhārauṣadhadravyāṇāṃ svābhāviko gurvādiguṇayogaḥ tadyathā maṣamudgayoḥ śūkaraiṇayośca /
GS40caraka_u:2421: māṣamudgayor iti prakṛtyā māṣe gurutvaṃ mudge ca laghutvaṃ śūkare gurutvam eṇe ca laghutvam // 3]
GS40caraka_u:2426: dravyāṇām iti vaktavye svābhāvikānām iti yat karoti tenotpattikāle janakabhūtaiḥ svaguṇāropaṇaṃ saṃskārastūtpannasyaiva toyādinā guṇāntarādhānamiti darśayati // 1
GS40caraka_u:2427: tacca prākṛtaguṇopamardenaiva kriyate yathā toyāgnisaṃnikarṣaśaucais taṇḍulasthaṃ gauravam upahatya lāghavam anne kriyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:2428: yaduktaṃ sudhautaḥ prasrutaḥ svinnaḥ saṃtaptaś caudano laghuḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2430: manthanādguṇādhānaṃ yathā śothakṛd dadhi śothaghnaṃ sasnehamapi manthanāt iti // 5
GS40caraka_u:2431: deśena yathā bhasmarāśer adhaḥ sthāpayet ityādau // 6
GS40caraka_u:2433: bhāvanayā ca svarasādikṛtayā sthitasyaivāmalakāder guṇasyotkarṣo bhavati // 8
GS40caraka_u:2435: bhājanena yathā traiphalenāyasīṃ pātrīṃ kalkenālepayet ityādau // 10
GS40caraka_u:2437_0: nanu saṃskārādheyena guṇena kathaṃ svābhāvikaguṇanāśaḥ kriyate yataḥ svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2437_1: ityuktaṃ yadi hi saṃskāreṇa svābhāvikagurutvaṃ pratikriyate tadā svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2437_2: iti kathaṃ brūmaḥ svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ iti svabhāvo bhāvānām utpattau nānyathā kriyate // 12
GS40caraka_u:2438: tena jātipratibaddhaṃ māṣādīnāṃ gurutvaṃ na tajjātau sphoṭayituṃ pāryate saṃskāreṇa tu tadanyathākaraṇamanumatameva dṛṣṭatvāt // 13
GS40caraka_u:2439: kaścit tu guṇo dravyāṇāṃ saṃskārādināpi nānyathā kriyate yathā vahner auṣṇyaṃ vāyoścalatvaṃ tailasya sneha ityādi // 14
GS40caraka_u:2442: uktaṃ hi guṇo dravyavināśād vā vināśam upagacchati // 17
GS40caraka_u:2444: yatra tu saṃskāreṇa vrīherlājalakṣaṇaṃ dravyāntarameva janyate tatra guṇāntarotpādaḥ suṣṭhveva // 19]
GS40caraka_u:2445: saṃyogaḥ punar dvayor bahūnāṃ vā dravyāṇāṃ saṃhatībhāvaḥ sa viśeṣamārabhate yaṃ punar naikaikaśo dravyāṇyārabhante tad yathā madhusarpiṣoḥ madhumatsyapayasāṃ ca saṃyogaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2448: sa viśeṣamārabhata iti saṃyujyamānadravyaikadeśe 'dṛṣṭaṃ kāryam ārabhata ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2449: yaṃ naikaikaśa iti yaṃ viśeṣaṃ pratyekasaṃyujyamānāni dravyāṇi nārabhanta ityarthaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2450: madhusarpiṣī hi pratyekamamārake milite tu mārake bhavataḥ kṣīramatsyādisaṃyogaśca kuṣṭhādikaro bhavati // 4
GS40caraka_u:2451_0: saṃyogas tv iha prādhānyenaivopalabhyamānadravyamelako vivakṣitas tena bhāvanādiṣvapi
GS40caraka_u:2451_1: yadyapi saṃyogo 'sti tathāpi tatra bhāvanādravyāṇāṃ prādhānyenānupalabdher na saṃyogena grahaṇam // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2453: tatra sarvasyāhārasya pramāṇagrahaṇam ekapiṇḍena sarvagrahaḥ parigrahaḥ punaḥ pramāṇagrahaṇam ekaikaśyenāhāradravyāṇām /
GS40caraka_u:2454: sarvasya hi grahaḥ sarvagrahaḥ sarvataśca grahaḥ parigraha ucyate /
GS40caraka_u:2457: mātrāmātraphalaviniścayārtha iti mātrāvadāhārauṣadhasya ca yat phalaṃ śubham amātrasya hīnasyātiriktasya vā yat phalam aśubham // 2
GS40caraka_u:2458: yaduktaṃ tasya jñānārtham ucitapramāṇam anucitapramāṇaṃ ca rāśisaṃjñaṃ bhavati // 3
GS40caraka_u:2462: ekaikaśyeneti annasya kuḍavaḥ sūpasya palaṃ māṃsasya dvipalamityādyavayavamānapūrvakaṃ samudāyamānam // 7
GS40caraka_u:2463: sarvagrahe pratyavayavamānaniyamo nāsti tena yena kenacid āhāreṇa pratyekamaniyatamānena sampūrṇāhāramātrāniyamanaṃ sarvagrahaḥ // 8
GS40caraka_u:2466: deśaḥ punaḥ sthānaṃ sa dravyāṇāmutpattipracārau deśasātmyaṃ cācaṣṭe /
GS40caraka_u:2471: tatrotpattyā himavati jātaṃ guṇavadbhavati marau jātaṃ laghu bhavati ityādi // 4
GS40caraka_u:2472: pracāreṇa laghu bhakṣyāṇāṃ prāṇināṃ tathā dhanvapracāriṇāṃ bahukriyāṇāṃ ca lāghavaṃ viparyaye ca gauravaṃ gṛhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:2473: deśasāmyena ca deśaviparītaguṇaṃ sātmyaṃ gṛhyate yathānūpe uṣṇarūkṣādi dhanvani ca śītasnigdhādi // 6
GS40caraka_u:2475: kālo hi nityagaś cāvasthikaśca tatrāvasthiko vikāramapekṣate nityagastu ṛtusātmyāpekṣaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2479: vikāramapekṣata iti bālyādikṛtaṃ tu śleṣmavikāraṃ jvarādikaṃ cāhāraniyamārthamapekṣata ityarthaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2483: evamāhāropayogaḥ kartavya evaṃ na kartavya ityupayoganiyamaḥ sa jīrṇalakṣaṇāpekṣa iti prādhānyenoktaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:2484: teneha ajalpann ahasan nātidrutaṃ nātivilambitam ityādyupayoganiyamamapyapekṣata eva ajīrṇabhojane tu mahāṃstridoṣakopalakṣaṇo doṣo bhavatītyayam evodāhṛtaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2488: yadāyattam okasātmyam iti bhoktṛpuruṣāpekṣaṃ hy abhyāsasātmyaṃ bhavati kasyaciddhi kiṃcid evābhyāsāt pathyamapathyaṃ vā sātmyaṃ bhavati // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2489_0: eṣāṃ viśeṣāḥ śubhāśubhaphalāḥ parasparopakārakā bhavanti tān bubhutseta buddhvā ca
GS40caraka_u:2489_1: hitepsureva syāt na ca mohāt pramādādvā priyam ahitam asukhodarkam upasevyam āhārajātam
GS40caraka_u:2491: eṣāmityādau śubhaphalā viśeṣā aśubhaphalāśca parasparopakārakā bhavantīti jñeyam // 1
GS40caraka_u:2492: tatra prakṛtyā lāghavādiḥ śubhaphalaḥ gurvādiś cāśubhaphalaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2495: evaṃ kālāsātmyamaśubhaphalaṃ cājīrṇabhojanādi tathā okāsātmyaṃ cāśubhamaśubhaphalamiti jñeyaṃ viparītaṃ tu śubhaphalam // 5
GS40caraka_u:2496: mohāditi ajñānāt pramādāditi jñātvāpi rāgād ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:2499: asukhaṃ duḥkharūpam udarka uttarakālīnaṃ phalaṃ yasya sa tathā // 9
GS40caraka_u:2501_1: bhuñjānānāṃ bhavati uṣṇaṃ snigdhaṃ mātrāvat jīrṇe vīryāviruddham iṣṭe deśe iṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2501_2: nātidrutaṃ nātivilambitam ajalpan ahasan tanmanā bhuñjīta ātmānamabhisamīkṣya samyak // Car_3,1.24
GS40caraka_u:2505: āturāṇāṃ ca keṣāṃciditi padena raktapittināṃ śītameva kapharogiṇāṃ rūkṣameva hitamityādiviparyayaṃ darśayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:2506: keṣāṃcidbhuñjānānām idam āhāravidhividhānaṃ hitatamaṃ bhavatīti yojanā // 4
GS40caraka_u:2507_0: prakṛtyaiveti svabhāvenaiva hitatamaṃ hitatamam ityuktaṃ tena yat prakṛtyā hitaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2507_1: tat kadācideva kaṃcideva puruṣam āsādyāhitaṃ bhavati tacca kādācitkatvād anādṛtaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2507_2: tena prāyikatvādenaṃ hitatamaṃ vakṣyāma iti bhāvaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:2509_0: tasya sādguṇyam upadekṣyāma uṣṇam aśnīyād uṣṇaṃ hi bhujyamānaṃ svadate bhuktaṃ cāgnim
GS40caraka_u:2509_1: audaryam udīrayati kṣipraṃ jarāṃ gacchati vātam anulomayati śleṣmāṇaṃ ca parihrāsayati
GS40caraka_u:2510_0: snigdhamaśnīyāt snigdhaṃ hi bhujyamānaṃ svadate bhuktaṃ cānudīrṇam agnim udīrayati
GS40caraka_u:2510_1: kṣipraṃ jarāṃ gacchati vātamanulomayati śarīramupacinoti dṛḍhīkarotīndriyāṇi balābhivṛddhim
GS40caraka_u:2515_0: mātrāvadaśnīyāt mātrāvaddhi bhuktaṃ vātapittakaphān apīḍayad āyur eva vivardhayati
GS40caraka_u:2515_1: kevalaṃ sukhaṃ gudam anuparyeti na coṣmāṇamupahanti avyathaṃ ca paripākameti tasmānmātrāvad aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2517: mātrāvaditi praśaṃsāyāṃ matup tena praśastamātram ityarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:2518: apīḍayaditi anatimātratvena svasthānasthitaṃ sadvātādīn sthānāpīḍanād aprakopayat // 2
GS40caraka_u:2521_0: jīrṇe 'śnīyāt ajīrṇe hi bhuñjānasyābhyavahṛtam āhārajātaṃ pūrvasyāhārasya rasam apariṇatam
GS40caraka_u:2521_1: uttareṇāhārarasenopasṛjat sarvān doṣān prakopayatyāśu jīrṇe tu bhuñjānasya svasthānastheṣu
GS40caraka_u:2521_2: doṣeṣvagnau codīrṇe jātāyāṃ ca bubhukṣāyāṃ vivṛteṣu ca srotasāṃ mukheṣu viśuddhe
GS40caraka_u:2521_3: codgāre hṛdaye viśuddhe vātānulomye visṛṣṭeṣu ca vātamūtrapurīṣavegeṣvabhyavahṛtam
GS40caraka_u:2521_4: āhārajātaṃ sarvaśarīradhātūn apradūṣayad āyur evābhivardhayati kevalaṃ tasmājjīrṇe 'śnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2525: āhāraraseneti āhārapariṇāmagatena madhurādinā kiṃvā āhārajena rasena // 3
GS40caraka_u:2527: vīryāviruddham aśnīyāt aviruddhavīryam aśnan hi viruddhavīryāhārajairvikārair nopasṛjyate tasmād vīryāviruddham aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2530_0: iṣṭe deśe iṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ cāśnīyāt iṣṭe hi deśe bhuñjāno nāniṣṭadeśajairmanovighātakarair
GS40caraka_u:2530_1: bhāvair manovighātaṃ prāpnoti tathaiveṣṭaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ tasmādiṣṭe deśe tatheṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ cāśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2532: manovighātakarairbhāvairiti trividhakukṣīye vakṣyamāṇaiḥ kāmādibhiś cittopatāpakaraiś cittavikārair ityarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:2533: tatheṣṭaiśca sarvopakaraṇair bhuñjāno manovighātaṃ na prāpnotīti yojanā aniṣṭabhojanāder manovighāto bhavati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2534: nātidrutamaśnīyāt atidrutaṃ hi bhuñjānasyotsnehanamavasādanaṃ bhojanasyāpratiṣṭhānaṃ ca bhojyadoṣasādguṇyopalabdhiś ca na niyatā tasmānnātidrutam aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2539: bhojyagatānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ keśādīnāṃ sādguṇyasya ca svādutvādeḥ upalabdhir na niyatā bhavati kadācidupalabhyate kadācin neti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2540: tatra doṣānupalabdhyā sadoṣasyaiva bhakṣaṇaṃ sādguṇyānupalabdhyā ca prītyabhāvaḥ // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2541: nātivilambitam aśnīyāt ativilambitaṃ hi bhuñjāno na tṛptim adhigacchati bahu bhuṅkte śītībhavaty āhārajātaṃ viṣamaṃ ca pacyate tasmānnātivilambitam aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2543: viṣamaṃ ca pacyata iti cirakālabhojanenāgnisambandhasya vaiṣamyāditi bhāvaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2544: ajalpannahasan tanmanā jalpato hasato 'nyamanasa vā bhuñjānasya ta eva hi doṣā bhavanti ya evātidrutam aśnataḥ tasmād ajalpannahasaṃstanmanā bhuñjīta /
GS40caraka_u:2546: ya evātidrutam aśnato doṣā iti utsnehanādayaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2547: ātmānam abhisamīkṣya bhuñjīta samyag idaṃ mamopaśete idaṃ nopaśeta ityevaṃ viditaṃ hy asyātmana ātmasātmyaṃ bhavati tasmādātmānamabhisamīkṣya bhuñjīta samyagiti // Car_3,1.25
GS40caraka_u:2549: nopaśeta itītyatra itiśabdena sātmyāsātmyavidhānopadarśakena vicāraphalamokasātmyasevanaṃ darśayati // 1
GS40caraka_u:2550: ātmana iti padenātmanaivātmasātmyaṃ pratipuruṣaṃ jñāyate na śāstropadeśeneti darśayati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2552: veda yo deśakālau ca śarīraṃ ca sa no bhiṣak // Car_3,1.26
GS40caraka_u:2555: sa no bhiṣagiti no 'smākaṃ saṃmata ityarthaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2557: dravyāṇi nātisevyāni trividhaṃ sātmyameva ca // Car_3,1.27
GS40caraka_u:2560: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte vimānasthāne rasavimānaṃ nāma prathamo'dhyāyaḥ // Car_3,1.29
GS40caraka_u:2562: doṣavikārau ca yadyapi trividhakukṣīye prabhāvavistāreṇa vaktavyau tathāpīha saṃkṣepeṇoktāv eva tena doṣavikāraprabhāvāv apyuktāv iti yaducyate saṃgrahe tat sādhu // 1
GS40caraka_u:2563: tailādidravyatrayakathanaṃ ca dravyaprabhāvagṛhītamiti kṛtvā na pṛthak saṃgrahe paṭhitam // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2567: iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ // Car_5,1.2
GS40caraka_u:2569: puruṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ kasmāt prabhavaḥ puruṣasya kaḥ // Car_5,1.3
GS40caraka_u:2570: kim ajño jñaḥ sa nityaḥ kiṃ kim anityo nidarśitaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2571: prakṛtiḥ kā vikārāḥ ke kiṃ liṅgaṃ puruṣasya ca // Car_5,1.4
GS40caraka_u:2572: niṣkriyaṃ ca svatantraṃ ca vaśinaṃ sarvagaṃ vibhum /
GS40caraka_u:2573: vadanty ātmānam ātmajñāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ sākṣiṇaṃ tathā // Car_5,1.5
GS40caraka_u:2574: niṣkriyasya kriyā tasya bhagavan vidyate katham /
GS40caraka_u:2575: svatantraś ced aniṣṭāsu kathaṃ yoniṣu jāyate // Car_5,1.6
GS40caraka_u:2576: vaśī yady asukhaiḥ kasmād bhāvair ākramyate balāt /
GS40caraka_u:2577: sarvāḥ sarvagatatvāc ca vedanāḥ kiṃ na vetti saḥ // Car_5,1.7
GS40caraka_u:2579: kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetram athavā kiṃ pūrvam iti saṃśayaḥ // Car_5,1.8
GS40caraka_u:2580: jñeyaṃ kṣetraṃ vinā pūrvaṃ kṣetrajño hi na yujyate /
GS40caraka_u:2581: kṣetraṃ ca yadi pūrvaṃ syāt kṣetrajñaḥ syād aśāśvataḥ // Car_5,1.9
GS40caraka_u:2582: sākṣibhūtaś ca kasyāyaṃ kartā hy anyo na vidyate /
GS40caraka_u:2583: syāt kathaṃ cāvikārasya viśeṣo vedanākṛtaḥ // Car_5,1.10
GS40caraka_u:2584: atha cārtasya bhagavaṃs tisṛṇāṃ kāṃ cikitsati /
GS40caraka_u:2585: atītāṃ vedanāṃ vaidyo vartamānāṃ bhaviṣyatīm // Car_5,1.11
GS40caraka_u:2587: sāṃpratikyā api sthānaṃ nāsty arteḥ saṃśayo hy ataḥ // Car_5,1.12
GS40caraka_u:2588: kāraṇaṃ vedanānāṃ kiṃ kim adhiṣṭhānam ucyate /

GS40caraka_u:2591: ekaḥ praśānto bhūtātmā kair liṅgair upalabhyate // Car_5,1.14
GS40caraka_u:2592: ity agniveśasya vacaḥ śrutvā matimatāṃ varaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2593: sarvaṃ yathāvat provāca praśāntātmā punarvasuḥ // Car_5,1.15
GS40caraka_u:2595: cetanādhātur apy ekaḥ smṛtaḥ puruṣasaṃjñakaḥ // Car_5,1.16
GS40caraka_u:2597: mano daśendriyāṇy arthāḥ prakṛtiś cāṣṭadhātukī // Car_5,1.17
GS40caraka_u:2598: lakṣaṇaṃ manaso jñānasyābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:2599: sati hy ātmendriyārthānāṃ sannikarṣe na vartate // Car_5,1.18
GS40caraka_u:2600: vaivṛttyān manaso jñānaṃ sānnidhyāt tac ca vartate /
GS40caraka_u:2601: aṇutvam atha caikatvaṃ dvau guṇau manasaḥ smṛtau // Car_5,1.19
GS40caraka_u:2602: cintyaṃ vicāryam ūhyaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ saṃkalpyam eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:2603: yat kiṃcin manaso jñeyaṃ tat sarvaṃ hy arthasaṃjñakam // Car_5,1.20
GS40caraka_u:2605: ūho vicāraś ca tataḥ paraṃ buddhiḥ pravartate // Car_5,1.21

GS40caraka_u:2610: ūhyaṃ ca yat sambhāvanayā ūhyate evametadbhaviṣyati iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2615: ete ca mano'rthāḥ śabdādirūpā eva tena ṣaṣṭhārthakalpanayā na caturviṃśatisaṃkhyātirekaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:2616: sukhādayas tu śabdādivyatiriktā mano'rthā buddhibhedagrahaṇenaiva grāhyāḥ // 10
GS40caraka_u:2618_0: indriyābhigrahaḥ indriyādhiṣṭhānaṃ manasaḥ karma tathā svasya nigraho manasaḥ karma
GS40caraka_u:2618_1: mano hy aniṣṭaviṣayaprasṛtaṃ manasaiva niyamyate manaśca guṇāntarayuktaṃ sadviṣayāntarān

GS40caraka_u:2621: tena dhṛtyā kāraṇabhūtayā ātmānaṃ niyamayatīti na svātmani kriyāvirodhaḥ // 15
GS40caraka_u:2623: atroha ālocanajñānaṃ nirvikalpakam vicāro heyopādeyatayā vikalpanam // 17
GS40caraka_u:2624: caturvidhaṃ hi vikalpakāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyā manyante tatra bāhyam indriyarūpam ābhyantaraṃ tu mano'haṃkāro buddhiśceti tritayam // 18
GS40caraka_u:2625_0: tatrendriyāṇyālocayanti nirvikalpena gṛhṇantītyarthaḥ manastu saṃkalpayati heyopādeyatayā
GS40caraka_u:2625_1: kalpayatītyarthaḥ ahaṃkāro 'bhimanyate mamedamahamatrādhikṛta iti manyata ityarthaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2625_2: buddhir adhyavasyati tyajāmyenaṃ doṣavantam upādadāmyenaṃ guṇavantam ityadhyavasāyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2626: ūhas tu yadyapi bāhyacakṣurādikarma tathāpi tatrāpi mano'dhiṣṭhānam astīti manaḥkarmatayoktaḥ // 20
GS40caraka_u:2627: vacanaṃ hi sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt // 21
GS40caraka_u:2628: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi iti // 22
GS40caraka_u:2629: tataḥ paraṃ buddhiḥ pravartata iti ūhavicārānantaraṃ buddhir adhyavasāyaṃ karotītyarthaḥ // 23
GS40caraka_u:2630: ahaṃkāravyāpāraś cābhimananam ihānukto 'pi buddhivyāpāreṇaiva sūcito jñeyaḥ // 24
GS40caraka_u:2631: buddhirhi tyajāmyenamupādadāmīti vādhyavasāyaṃ kurvatī ahaṃkārābhimata eva viṣaye bhavati tena buddhivyāpāreṇaivāhaṃkāravyāpāro 'pi gṛhyate // 25
GS40caraka_u:2636: kalpyate manasā tūrdhvaṃ guṇato doṣato'thavā // Car_5,1.22
GS40caraka_u:2638: vyavasyati tayā vaktuṃ kartuṃ vā buddhipūrvakam // Car_5,1.23
GS40caraka_u:2647: vyavasyatīti anuṣṭhānaṃ karoti udyukto bhavatītyarthaḥ buddhyadhyavasitamarthaṃ vaktuṃ kartuṃ vānutiṣṭhatīti yāvat // 8
GS40caraka_u:2648: buddhipūrvakamityanena yadeva buddhipūrvakam anuṣṭhānaṃ tad evaivaṃvidhaṃ bhavati nonmattādyanuṣṭhānamiti darśayati // 9]
GS40caraka_u:2650: pañca karmānumeyāni yebhyo buddhiḥ pravartate // Car_5,1.24
GS40caraka_u:2652: mano'bhidhāyendriyāṇyabhidhatte tatrāpi jyāyastvād buddhīndriyāṇi prāgāha ekaiketyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2653: khādīnāṃ madhye ekaikenādhikena bhūtena yuktānīndriyāṇi pañca cakṣurādīni ekaikādhikapadena pañcāpi pāñcabhautikāni paraṃ cakṣuṣi tejo'dhikamityādyuktaṃ sūcayati // 2
GS40caraka_u:2655: yebhyo buddhiḥ pravartata iti yāni buddhīndriyāṇi tānīmāni pañceti darśayati // 4
GS40caraka_u:2656_0: yadyapi ca sāṃkhye āhaṃkārikāṇīndriyāṇi yaduktaṃ sāttvika ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtād
GS40caraka_u:2656_1: ahaṃkārād iti tathāpi matabhedādbhautikatvam indriyāṇāṃ jñeyaṃ kiṃvā aupacārikam
GS40caraka_u:2656_2: etadbhautikatvam indriyāṇāṃ jñeyam upacārabījaṃ ca yad guṇabhūyiṣṭhaṃ yad indriyaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2656_3: gṛhṇāti tattadbhūyiṣṭham ityucyate cakṣustejo gṛhṇāti tena taijasam ucyate ityādi jñeyam // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2660: jihvāvāgindriyaṃ vāk ca satyā jyotistamo'nṛtā // Car_5,1.26
GS40caraka_u:2666: jyotiriva jyotiḥ dharmakartṛtvenobhayalokaprakāśakāritvāt etadviparyayeṇa tamaḥ anṛtā // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2667: mahābhūtāni khaṃ vāyur agnir āpaḥ kṣitistathā /
GS40caraka_u:2668: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca tadguṇāḥ // Car_5,1.27
GS40caraka_u:2670: sampratyuddeśakramānurodhādarthe 'bhidhātavye 'rthānāṃ prakṛtigrahaṇagṛhītapañcabhūtaguṇatayā parādhīnatvād aṣṭadhātuprakṛtigṛhītāni bhūtānyeva tāvadāha mahābhūtānītyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2671: śabdādayo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ khādīnāṃ naisargikā guṇā jñeyāḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2672: yastu guṇotkarṣo 'bhidhātavyaḥ sa hi anupraviṣṭabhūtasambandhād eva // 3
GS40caraka_u:2673: tena pṛthivyāṃ caturbhūtapraveśāt pañcaguṇatvam evaṃ jalādāv api caturguṇatvādi jñeyam // 4]
GS40caraka_u:2675: pūrvaḥ pūrvaguṇaścaiva kramaśo guṇiṣu smṛtaḥ // Car_5,1.28
